The place is open and has outdoor seating. 

They can accommodate any meal plan and if you call ahead they can have it waiting for you. 

All the cool vibe of a hip food restaurant without the guilt.

This is the place if you are getting fit and still want a place to feel like a restaurant. 

They cover several meal plans like Paleo, HGC, Vegetarian, bla bla they even have ala cart so you can pick your poison or health kick :) 

There is calorie information listed so you can plan your meal accordingly. 

But even if your not in a diet or meal plan, they got a cool diverse menu.

I enjoyed proteins and greens. I ordered the wellness drink and hummus. The drink was delicious!!! The hummus was decent, served with pita bread and chips. 

What a great spot for a healthy drink, snack or meal. Staff was very nice!!

I had a large lunch order for work that I had to deliver by 11:30 and the Downtown Greens and Proteins totally took care of me.  It was ready on-time, each item was labeled with the person's name, so no one had to wonder who got what, and they helped me haul it all to my car.  Great experience, looking forward to going back!

Update on my last review. The owner Patrick replied to my review and invited me back in to make it right and discuss my visit. He was super nice and knowledgeable! The employees were really nice this time around! Food and smoothies  tasted awesome and super healthy for you! My son and I each had the build your own with chicken and broccoli and he got rice and I got quinoa. He had teriyaki sauce and I had 1 teriyaki
1 spicy peanut and 1 pesto. They were all great!
My daughter being a teenager had the buffalo chicken lol! She enjoyed it! Me & my son split the juice called the Malibu breeze it was yummy & full of nutritious things our body needs! Great experience this time around! We will be back! Patrick is awesome! If only all business owners could work there business all day lol!

Ate there for the first time this weekend one word YUM! ordered the protein pancakes came with fresh banana slices and pecan slices in top oh and agave syrup on the side A PERFECT 10! Not to mention large portions. Hubby had the burger with turkey bacon and sweet potato fries and ordered the little one a pizza and BOY was it big two kids could have eaten from it. $30 for the meal but Groupon has a coupon you can purchase now so jump on it! Lastly the service was fantastic and both the restaurant and bathrooms were squeaky clean!
This place is Amazing.. The burgers, shakes, wraps.. Everything! I love the quality of the food, it's always fresh, the staff is always friendly and happy.
The food was great but the staff were a little lacking in personality and engagement.

I checked this place out a few days ago.  Ample seating and an outdoor sitting area-dogs welcome.  They have a wide selection and I chose to make my meal. You select a protein, vegetable, and carb.  I went with the chicken breast, asparagus, and mashed sweet potatoes (a little less than.  Everything tastes so good!  The chicken was sliced, juicy and well seasoned.  The asparagus was great dipped in the lemon vinaigrette I selected and of course the mashed sweet potatoes were good!  Seemed a bit pricy or the meal but that is what you will get if you are striving for grass-fed antibiotic free meat.

THis has been on my list for a while but rarely do I get to this side of town. I liked it! I'll be back, let's break it down

Atmosphere: Clean, well lighted,,, I felt healthy walking in. Smells fresh.  Basic seating set up.  I went at 11:30 Saturday and it was not too crowded,, people there but not too much.

Food: That's what you're here for right? The best description again is,,, clean.  Seems to me that it's all natural organic type food.  I've had burgers, Avocado/Crab cups, and some of the drinks.  Burgers are surprisingly juicy, and I'm looking to try some of the salads next time.

Drink: Note the smoothies are like a meal so you probably don't want that AND a full meal unless you are splitting.   The juices are all very nice and clean.  Favourite is the Wellness drink.

Price: For what it is,,  a little expensive,, a juice and any meal will be twenty.  One of the other Yelpers claimed it was the Whole Foods of restaurants and I think its a great comparison.

Miscellaneous: One of the few places I can think of that put calorie counts.

want food poisoning ? my burger was not even cooked unacceptable it was red raw on the inside 
leaving 5 stars so everyone sees this!!!!!!!
Photos attached!

I eat here almost every day. It's such a great healthy option and it's very close to my gym. My favorite drinks are the wellness juice and the green smoothie. Watermelon is great, too! The bison cheese steak is delicious in a spinach wrap! And the make your own option keeps you mixing and matching every visit. The teriyaki sauce makes any of them taste good. You HAVE to try the sweet potato mash. The service is wonderful, as well. Y'all are always so friendly : )

G & P gets better all the time. Varied menu selections make this a favorite place.  What impresses me as much as the food quality is the fact that if something is not to your liking (and no place is perfect) just explain that to them & they will eagerly make it right.  This is a quality, healthy, & well run restaurant with freshly prepared smoothies & food that will please you.

Very little flavor for the $47 +tip I spent.  My girlfriend and I decided to try a "healthy" spot for the first time. Chicken cheese wrap was juicy but had no taste. The buffalo chicken wrap was the better of the two and actually had flavor.  for fries they offered hicama, sweet potato and tofu. So i choose the hicama because I've tried it fried, and i know its good. They gave me raw hicama, and said that's how they always serve it. I also purchased ahi tuna tacos,  they also lacked flavor and were served on what tasted like an unheated corn tortilla. Best flavor was the replacement sweet potato fries i was up-charged for.
Best selection and a favorite every time I'm in vegas. The menu caters to all....diet, vegan, whatever. ...it's all good. The chocolate peanut butter Nanna shake rocks.....
Amazing place...healthy shouldn't taste this good! The staff was very friendly and explained all the small details I needed to make the best dining choice I have made in a while...keeper!

I love this place. Really good, healthy, guilt-free food that doesn't feel healthy or guilty-free. The food is delicious and light. Perfect for breakfast, lunch or and early dinner. The juices and smoothies are fantastic as well. Made from scratch right in front of you from whole fruits and veggies.

Veggie Flatbread: Really tasty. They use unconventional veggies that normal wouldn't be on a veggie pizza. Artichoke hearts, Greek and black olives, spinach, orange bell peppers and classic red onions.  

Buffalo Chicken Flatbread: Right up my man's alley. Although there isn't a ton of buffalo sauce flavor, it's more of a BBQ chicken pizza, it's still scrumptious. Make sure you ask for ranch. It's a Greek yogurt ranch but it's so good. And guilt-free. 

Ginger Limeade Juice: I get this every time I go there. It's so light and refreshing. And a green drink so who can complain?  

I'll be frequenting this place often and definitely adding to my review with different menu items. Also I'd like to add that the restaurant was super accommodating to my dog on the patio. They gave him water in a cup and everything. So nice!

I've come here a handful of times for a guilt-free post-workout meal. I love the various options that make eating low carb easy. The proteins (chicken, salmon, etc.) always seemed to be well seasoned and tasty. But I recommend you ask about the preparation of your sides if you get a plate - sometimes they are not seasoned and you need to order a sauce that will compliment them well. 

Also - dog friendly. It has outdoor seating (in the shade) where they will bring you your food after you order at the counter.
I always get the wellness drink & the veggie pizza. They are delicious... Well everything I have tried always is. But why I love this place so much is their amazing customer service... It's the best.

Would be a 5 star but no employee knew the price for an extra ostrich patty, after a discussion the cook said between 5-8, a girl whispered to the cashier just do 8 thinking im deaf. No set price so charge as much as you can. Nice ethics

Angus Burger 5/5
Tofu Fries 5/5 
Jicama Fries...cold sticks with seasoning that look like fries 5/5
Watermelon, Raspberry, and Strawberry Juice 4/5

Recommend and we will return

This place is fabulous!!!!  I came in with expectations of plain food and a "granola" crowd. Wow were my expectations wrong!!  The food was amazing, I built my own meal, with the turkey breast which was pretty amazing!  The servers were very friendly and appeared to enjoy their time at work. Overall the experience was excellent and I would go back in a heartbeat.

I'm a frequent visitor of greens and proteins just because they list their macros and it's good on the go. However today I went to dine in since I had extra time on my hands. I get there around 1:00-1:30 pm and it seems as they just cooled down from lunch hour. Anyways so I order a chicken teriyaki sandwich with cheese and grilled onions added. I usually pay around 13$ for this. This time they charged me almost 15$ I was shocked but I rolled with it and requested the receipt. Later when I looked at the receipt I saw they charged me $2.00 for some grilled onions rather than the usually $0.50. So I'm sure it was a mistake so I take it up to the cashier and she fixes the issue for me and refunds me the difference. So here I am now waiting on my food for almost twenty minutes which also wasn't a big deal because I wasn't in a rush. However once I receive my food it's just disappointment. I got a cold chicken sandwich with no cheese and no grilled onions. (What I paid extra for) and to top it off my sweet potato fries were cold and barely edible. Overall it was an upsetting meal.

Im used to going to they're Henderson location. I happen to find out online there was one rainbow which is close to my house. It sounds silly but I got terribly lost and called to find out where they were and I was just told by a Starbucks and a dispenseray. I asked if they were in the arroyo crossing market (where I was) and he wasn't sure. On the website and on the phone he said 215 and rainbow. They are actually not on the 215 and rainbow they are located on rainbow and sunset!! I finally found it. When I got there my food was cold so I asked if they could reheat it I was kind of in a rush though and they just made me a new wraps they said. I guess it didn't take that long but still. I wish they could've given me better directions at least now I know where it is I still love the food. I just don't love the prices or the fact that they couldn't tell me exactly where the location was.

I have since gone back to greens and proteins and ordered as suggested the impossible burger medium cooked. It is significantly better cooked that way. However, I ordered it to go with sweet potato fries and instead got tofu fries. I do recommend going to Greens and Proteins but I also recommend you making sure you get what you ordered before leaving. Of course by the time I discovered that I had the Tofu fries I was already home.

This place is a hit or miss. Very inconsistent. We get the angus burgers and they are amazing sometimes and sometimes horrible. Sweet potato fries are usually not cooked properly. I love the food on a good day and on a bad day it just tastes like dirty grill and old oil. I wish it was more consistent.

I just moved near this location and have been here 4 times in a week, with the hopes of making this my daily breakfast spot. That hope has been dashed each and every visit for a number of reasons. 

1. Slow service. I ordered a salad and a wrap on two separate occasions at 3 in the afternoon (not busy) and it took upwards of 25minutes. That's excessive. 

2. Order accuracy. Out of my 4 orders, they have forgotten an item altogether twice and gave me the wrong smoothie a third time. 

3. No desire to make things right. When an establishment continues to make mistakes, a simple "sorry" doesn't cut it. They should be fixing their problems, and they obviously aren't. 

I may be foolish, but i may give them one more chance to turn things around. We'll see..

Very happy with this place. As far as healthy food places go, this would be one of the top. They have burgers, wraps and smoothies. I had the bison burger and it was great! They have "tofu fries" which I had not encountered yet, basically crispy tofu strips that they serve with a tasty dipping sauce. Seriously, you need to try this place if you are trying to eat a certain way or just want a more health conscious option. They break down menu items nutrition info, which is helpful to those on a diet. Staff are cool...I guess I'm gonna give it a five star review now, I didn't really write anything bad....well bowled Greens and Protein.

I was skeptical as I perused the menu today which on yelp has 4 items very strangely lumped together. My bf and I go eat brunch maybe once a week usually the same place, but were trying to be healthier so this seemed cool however far from our house. 

  The staff is incredible. Polite over achievers, really happy smiling bunch. Giving us samples as we waiting for the previous family decide their order. 

Green ginger lime juice was delicious. And a huge size compared to other similar joints. I got the turkey burger on wheat. Huge fresh patty grilled bun vegan cheese heirloom tomato not your average turkey burger. Tofu fries are very seasoned looking but not overwhelmingly spicy. Quite mild Could stand to bump up the heat a little even. Comes on a triangle plate which was fun. 

Bf got the chicken satay. Delicious good size portion excellent plating. Complimentary cucumber water probably was the highlight of it all for me. Id come back just for that. Stiff uninviting tables when you dine in but they're surpringly comfortable.

Came here for morning greens smoothie and the lady at front counter was very nice and accommodating to my orders. Smoothies tasted like how I made at home so I was happy. I would definitely go here again
Acai Berry smooth is bomb....excellent....chef Calvin recommend a wellness drink so we shall see.......yep delicious
I have been here everyday since they opened. The juices and smoothies are amazing. And the tofu fries are addicting. Great service and atmosphere.

I go to greens and proteins 2-3x a week on the Decatur. Location. So since I was working in this area today  I thought to myself let me just grab some lunch from greens and proteins since I know what I like already. So I order my usual which is a teriyaki sandwich and sweet potato fries. I open it in the car cause I was starving and their sweet potato fries are usually so hot,crispy, and delish but this time I grab one and its just wet and soggy and limp.   Anyways I have hope and I'm like maybe it's a one off situation but nope when I get to my desk 5 mins later  and open my food all my fries are wet and soggy and my sandwich was broken and a mushy mess. (Mind you I didn't even pick it up still and this never happened at the Decatur location.) this was super disappointing especially since I spend a few extra bucks for quality. If it wasn't about health and quality I would just give my business elsewhere. Therefore as of now I'll stick to eating here when I'm around the Decatur location because I have been their consistently and have not had a bad experience.

So glad that this has opened up near our house. We used to go to the other locations a few times but they were a bit far away. Now that this has opened, we are visiting at least once a week, to work our way through the menu. The tofu fries are the best, and the salads are huge!! Perfect for hungry people like me and my husband!

We came here for breakfast on a Sunday morning. We originally were going to the sunrise cafe next door but they had a long wait and the place was packed so we decided to try this place out. 

The layout is not bad and it has a clean feel. They have a good selection on the menu. Customer service was not bad but not that great either. The girl at the counter wasn't too friendly but wasn't rude either. 

I decided to have the breakfast burrito and my girlfriend ordered the Acai bowl. 

The burrito was pretty good. Not too big but enough to be filling. I was not a fan of the  tofu potatoes that came on the side. But that's not a deal breaker.

Here is the part that knocks off a couple stars. The acai bowl was almost completely frozen still. It had possibly the worst texture and consistency I've seen in an acai bowl. It was topped with granola and fruit which is nice but no honey or agave which left a lot of flavor to be desired. If I'm going to pay 8$ for a bowl, at least make sure to take the time to finish blending the acai instead of sending the bowl out half frozen. 

So this place isn't terrible but could use some friendlier customer service, and I recommend shying away from the acai bowl.

It's unfortunate. Because the food is uniquely healthy. But and it's a big but. The customer service was very bad. The young man with the buffe hair cut must of been related to the owner because there is no way his smug kurt unapologetic way of non helping with ordering could be accepted anywhere else. He got the order wrong and the girl made us prove that we ordered and paid for water. The only thing I can say is reverse racist comes to mind. People keep that in mind when eating there. Otherwise food was good.
I ordered talapia, wakame salad, and white beans through door dash. I got the food quickly but the talapia was fishy and unseasoned. Pretty boring.

So after multiple check ins I finally decided to write a review. . .yeah yeah. . .we can all get lazy sometimes.  LOL

This last check in. . .I actaully tried their food for the first time.  Every other time that I have gone, I got smoothies.  More on them later. . .

I got their daily special of Turkey chili with cannellini beans.  TBH, I got it cuz it was warm and I was actually cold that day. . .LOL  But I gotta give them props. . .if you had not told me that it was "healthy" I would never had thought that it was.  It was freaking delicious!  The mouth feel was just like a meaty chili, flavor had just the small amount of heat that just made you want to take another bite.  It came with some lavash which added some great crunch to the dish.  I would go back just for this dish.  It was that good!!  And to think that it was acutally healthy for me. . .*gasp*  LOL  (5/5)

The second dish was kind of a fail for me.  I love chicken lettuce wraps and I order their "RAW cashew" chicken lettucs wraps.  The look of it was cute.  They served it on little butter lettuce leaves with a little micro greens on top.  The flavor was NOT like a chicken lettuce wrap.  The Texture was NOT like a chicken lettuce wrap. . .and like a dummy I didn't realize until that I bit into that it was a "RAW" food which meant that nothing was heated.  So it was a cold mealy scoop of cashews mixed with something on a lettuce cup.  I DO NOT reccomend.  Unless you are totally into RAW foods. . .I am guessing if I was that I might have liked it??  I honestly don't know what I was expecting BUT I was thinking with the words chicken lettuce wrap in it that it would feel like chicken and taste like a traditional lettuce wrap in my mouth?? (1/5)

Service. . .ALWAYS impeccable!  (5/5)

Smoothies. . .including the veggiechino. . .yes u read that right. . .a vegetable smoothie with espresso in it. . .OMG DELICIOUS!!!  (5/5)

Overall, heck yeah I am going back. . .BUT next time I will definitely skip the RAW foods section. . .lesson learned!  =)

This location is no bueno! I'll start off by mentioning we go to the location on Rainbow and we are always satisfied.  Why a bad review? I'll preface with our experience the one time we came in about 30 min before closing... we try not to do this because we understand we "hate" the customers that come in right before closing. On that visit, we understood why our food might of seemed rushed (wrap was wrapped loosely, pizza was not as yummy, etc). 

Today, we came in around 5pm. Ordered the BBQ chicken pizza and a wrap. I'm not exaggerating... it seemed like they forgot the BBQ on the "BBQ chicken pizza!!!" There were only BBQ on 2 of the 8 slices!!! I don't quite understand how that can happen.  Next, We ordered "add avocado" on the wrap.  I'm not sh!tting you... a small single slice was added to one side/corner of the "cut in half" wrap.  Last, the wrap was not properly wrapped as it just fell apart.  As a reminder... we go to the location on rainbow often and order the same items. We are definitely going to stop going to this location as every visit is disappointing.  I haven't checked if they are franchised/independently owned between these 2 locations but hopefully they can have more consistency. Until then I'll go elsewhere when around the Flamingo location.

5 stars for the food: It is healthy and very very good which is damn near impossible to find. So yea! 5 stars for food. Although if they got organic meat that would be freak-en amazing but whatev its still tasty & healthy that magical combination. 

I have been here at least 10 times so 3 Stars for counter help. They are not to friendly or helpful and I was charged more than what the menu states on a couple of occasions.

The customer service was so extraordinary, I am updating my review to reflect my experience. Both the owners responded to me. Whether they do or not is not personal for me - it's business. And they both care for their customers and their business. 
I got the Green Wellness Smoothie- tastes good AND I get my vegeys and fruits. Even my carnivorous buddy's getting a smoothie here. I love the concept. And the staff is friendly and helpful. 
I'll be back.

As I sit here at your restaurant, I'm in disbelief at how horrible the service is. I was super excited to try this place. First my bill came up to $37.87 and all I had was $100 dollar bill so per your supervisor or employee he said he could not take the hundred because they are getting to many fake $100 dollar bills, so I really felt he was insinuating my money was fake! So I said okay went to Starbucks and got change I still wanted to try this place despite one red flag. I asked what was in the Veggie Burger he said it's right there on the menu read it, I thought that was very rude as this was my first time here I thought he could tell me. Then I order a Smoothie when I got the smoothie it had a very bad taste and I asked if he could change it to another one as I only took one sip. He said no, so then I asked for a refund he said no. So now I have no drink as it's behind the counter and no refund I've never been to a restaurant where if something wasn't to the customers liking they wouldn't remake it or give a refund. I was very disappointed at the service here and had very high hopes for this place!

Had to stop into a place that holds two of my most prominent diet words in it's name. I really wish I had more time to try more of the menu, but, very limited amount of time in Vegas.

That said, the breakfast that was served to the table next to me looked amazing and I can't wait to try it.

This go around though, hammered down on the "build my own" with ostrich (check another animal off my "got ya bitch" list of animals consumed!), sketti squash and some mashed sweet taters. Also got an antioxidant blast smoothie (berry mix).

So, the chow.
Ostrich - very lean, and decent. Tried it without the citrus bbq sauce first, and it was ok. Was hoping for a bit of seasoning or something, but, it was just cooked meat and no seasoning help. With the citrus bbq, not bad at all and solid chunk of meat. Texture was and cooked temp were not bad either. All in all, a solid slab of lean meat.

Sketti squash - tasteless and didn't seem to be cooked enough. Was very disappointed in this one. I'm usually a huge fan of this and make it my own quite a bit (gives me something to do when my madre delivers 12 giant squashes from her garden). But, a little citrus bbq made it tolerable to wolf down like a desert coyote.

Mashed sweet taters - very good. Was really happy to see this on the menu as a carb option. I hadn't had them in a while, and was pleasantly surprised to have a solid plate of mashed sweets. Perfectly fluffy, not stringy (which sweet taters can be when mashed thanks to the fibers), and solid flavor. Only thing missing was a chance to throw some cinnamon on them. If you've  never done that before, give it a go. Fantastic. I promise.

Antioxidant smoothie - Great flavor, miss on the texture. I knew it'd be a bit think and chunky thanks to the apples (without an amazing juicer, apples are a prick to deal with). But, was hoping this place would have a juicer that'd take that away. Not so. 

In any event, smoothie and food rang up over $24. Considering the ingredients and if I were to order something similar elsewhere, I'm sure it'd be close to that too. So, not overly fussy with the price.
The chocolate penutbutter banana  smoothie is so delicious definitely my favorite, also best ahi protein salad. Love this place right after the gym.

The acai bowl is tasty, but really overpriced. They're lucky I ordered from postmates, if I had seen the small cup they were charging $8 for I would have gone and gotten twice as much for the same price somewhere else.
I love this place! Hands down one of the healthiest places to eat in Vegas! I do the lettuce cups. MMMMM....

I get it, the food is fresh and healthy. And yes it is tasty, but it shouldn't take 30 minutes to make a wrap (to go)especially when the place isn't that busy.  I was starting to wonder if I was ever going to get my food at all. And then no apology for taking forever. Immediately regret tipping up front.
Best place ever in Vegas they have the best smoothies the best wraps the best burgers everything the people here are so nice it's so clean

Healthy options if you don't feel like cooking after leaving the gym!

I used to come here a lot after my workouts since it is in the same shopping center as LVAC. Everything has the calories listed for the health conscious people.  The food is good and a little pricey which I don't mind since it is a lot healthier than Mickey D's.
We always get the Green Leaf Berry Blast which has only 255 calories.  Refreshing, filling and just the right amount of sweetness. Gave it 4 stars because at $7.50, I feel it's a little pricey.

I had already written a review but this one is for one of the workers. Daniel gives phenomenal service! Haven't received service like that in a while. He greeted me right when I walked in and even tho I didn't read need help, he engaged with guiding me through options and was just very kind. I didn't even tell him my name or anything, plus I paid in cash, and he called me by my name because he noticed my tiny keychain I had in my keys. I am just very impressed I needed to make this known, great job!
GREAT food, clean and healthy, lots of choices!  Very busy most times. Very casual, friendly staff!

Healthy, real food. A perfect alternative from the strip or freemont. Personally I needed a healthy juice after a night out so we'll say it's good for hangovers too 

Smoothies ($7.50) are large and yummy and have almond and soy milk as additives. The cold brew ($4.5) is actually like a pre workout because it has added supplements and caffeine.

I reduced my stars because this was nothing fancy and the shop was supposed to open at 7:00am and the staff didn't even show up until 7:15. :/

The wellness drink is the only green drink I have ever been able to drink... and actually enjoy! It just tastes like apples to me, and they sneak in a ton of healthy other stuff like kale etc. All of their food has been pretty good as well.
Had the tofu fries-perfectly done with great dipping sauce. Also had the banana chocolate smoothie-incredibly delicious! Love this place. Definite stop on every work trip to Vegas

Never in my life have I had worse service. 

Came to enjoy a nice meal with my family after a workout class. Took over an hour until we got all of our food and nothing was correct.

First, we were brought 1 salad (which was the wrong salad) and the server left before we could even let her know. It then sat on our table for 20 minutes, untouched until the server came back. We then watched the serve bring this same exact salad that already sat on our table to a table two tables away.

When we finally started getting more of the food which was 20 minutes after this, nothing came out at the same time. Everything we ordered came out incorrect. 
Salads, did not have dressing on the side, 
Ahi was terribly was over cooked, there were tomatoes when we asked three times for them not to be included on the wrap and then when the wrap was brought back again, it was evident that the tomatoes were just scraped out as there was still tomatoes in the wrap. They also forgot about the French toast, only the easiest thing on the freaking menu.

We asked for the manager to come out half way through this dilemma of everything not working correctly and we waited for over 40 minutes before we were even addressed.

There was no real resolution, service sucks at this location and is a real let down for a brand which we all previously enjoyed. Way to not put the customer first.

Always my favorite spot to eat with in Vegas. I'm from Southern California and a picky eater. I can definitely appreciate healthy CLEAN food. This place delivers perfectly. Staff is always friends. Highly recommended place for healthy clean food. Bodybuilders, fitness enthusiasts and competitors can still stay on their diet here. Everything is measure and calories are given.

Overpriced and underwhelming, this clean and organized store is light and spacious, and the staff are really polite and friendly. I also love how they have quite a few local business cards and promo materials at the pickup counter where you get your drinks- shows that they are involved in the local community, which I really like to see.

That being said, their smoothies and wraps are each around $8, which sounds about on par with other similar businesses- and for the smoothies I would say it's about right.
But I was not impressed with my tofu/chorizo breakfast wrap- I asked for it in a spinach wrap, which I use frequently at home to make my own wraps, and this one was not particularly full. Most bites had more overlapping layers of tortilla than filling or veggies. On top of that, the menu lists the wrap as coming with "a side of tofu homefries"- this sounded really cool to me and I was excited to check it out.
Imagine my surprise when I open my take out box in my car and realize that a "side" consists of exactly THREE crouton-sized pieces of tofu. They were tasty, but considering I spent $8 on my meal and my take out box was half empty, I'm not pleased. I genuinely don't know if someone was in a hurry and forgot my side, or if three pieces really constitutes a portion- it doesn't to me.

I might come back, but it won't be for food- which is really disappointing, because everything sounds great.

Side note: If you check in on Yelp, you get a dollar off of a juice or smoothie, which helps a bit with the pricing.

Super tasty and very healthy. The interior was appealing and the staff where really nice. My only few negatives is I wish there were more options on green Smoothies and the staff was a bit unorganized.

I am really not sure what the fuss is all about with this place. The service is abhorrently slow, they aren't particularly customer-centric and the prices for what you get are super high.

I've been in several times, don't know why I'm just now writing this, but I get the same thing generally every time.

This time walked up and was just asking a generic question, but was definitely ready to order when the guy in front of me picked up the phone and spent 3-4 minutes taking someone's order that was calling in. I just stood there and stared until he was done. Super rude.

Ordered the vegetable parm and it came with a small side of spinach. I was under the impression that I was getting a side of spaghetti squash, but it was actually UNDER the parm. Weird. This small plate of absolutely nothing cost me $10. Not happy. 

I've had pizza here before as well and while it had a nice taste to it, it again wasn't worth what I paid for it.

I get the concept here and I'm sure it looks cool when you hang out a place that touts itself as so healthy, but it really is a ripoff and the food isn't that great; it's just OKAY. 

Save some money and do it yourself, really.

Very good. Wellness drink is refreshing and French toast is hearty, sweet, and delicious. Big portion. Definitely not "fast food" meaning your gonna wait 10 minutes for food. Could use another location in Highlands Ranch!
Love this place. Green shake, wraps, chopped salad, sweet potato fries. Love them all!!!

During the fall, I will go slightly out of my way to step on a crunchy-looking leaf. Similarly, when I'm looking for healthy eats, I will go out of my way to come to this G&P location over the one by 215 and Flamingo- better product and service all the way around, totally redeemed the brand after my dismal visits to the other location!

Menu is packed with healthy options and every single item has the macros listed: calories, carbs, fats, and proteins, making my life so much easier. Standout items include any/all of the salads (particularly the ahi), and my guy digs the ostrich burger (don't forget the bbq sauce!). Love how you can customize everything, whether adding products to the shakes or ingredients to the salads (the tofu is perfect) or opting for a gluten free bun or cabbage wrap for your burgers/sandwiches. 

Location never seems to get too busy but is conveniently located. Staff are attentive, outgoing, and genuinely nice guys happy to make recommendations. Going to try the protein pancakes next!

It's been awhile since I ate at this place... I wanna say over a year? I've had nothing, but good experiences whenever I was here! They offer a good variety of meals for people who are watching their diet. They offer salads, burgers, sandwiches, bowls, smoothies, and juices. 
 
I came here for dinner with my girlfriend today and was pleased at how clean it still is after being around for couple years. The staff was very friendly and answered any questions we had regarding the menu. I ordered the bison burger and my girlfriend ordered the bison cheesesteak. Definitely not the healthiest things, but we were hungry... GAINZ. One thing I love about them is that they always have the cucumber water and it tastes so refreshing! We sat outside because the weather was nice and our meals did not take too long to make as well. The server brought it out to us and made sure we had everything that we needed. The bison burger was amazing! I got it medium rare and glad I did because you can feel the juices with every bite! They cooked it perfectly and it definitely tasted a lot cleaner than your usual burger. My girlfriend enjoyed her cheesesteak and took half of it home because the other half got her full. We got tofu fries as our side and I suggest anyone to get it! It's so good! The price range for the two items is around $10-$12 each I believe. Couldn't remember the exact price. Overall I prefer this over protein source as they have better tasting food! Price is about the same.

I love this place. It's a great option for people trying to eat healthy. They even have pizza! All the calories are displayed and the staff has always been super friendly towards me. I went there for lunch yesterday and waited for about 20 minutes for my food, which is unusual there. I went up to the counter just to check where I was in line and they already knew I had waited too long and gave me a $15 gift card for the trouble. That's great customer service!

I have yet to actually sit down for a meal here but it always smells good. I go in for wellness drinks and they always taste consistently delicious. The service can't be beat - swift and with a smile. I usually go on my way to work so I don't have time for the full blown meal but think I should soon considering the amazing reviews of items that I would like to experience.
My first time here! The hummus is freshly made. The salad is a decent size and the dressing was delicious. Everything I need to change the way I eat.  Will definetly be back
My gf and I love this place, they are so friendly and offer a wide variety of healthy food options. So conveniently placed next to a HUGE gym. Lol.

This place is great! Service has always been top notch. I go once or twice a week always to find something new and delicious. Chicken Tacos, BBQ chicken pizza, Steak salad, cheese steak wrap w/ spinach tortilla and Bison burger have been excellent. Food is always fresh and cooked to order. Great cook on the meats and seasoned properly. I cook a lot at home and when I don't this is one place I look forward to frequenting.

I wasn't impressed. Bought a watermelon juice $6. Didn't like it. Sister got a smoothie that was better then my drink for $7.50. Decor was modern. Lots of people were there who looked like they just left the gym. Probably good for people who are super healthy.  I didn't find it very welcoming.

So happy this place opened up here. I love coming to eat here but it's a little ways away as I live in the centennial area vs. Aliante. This place is so yummy and you don't have the guilt of eating here. Even hubby enjoys coming here. I'm not a fan of their jicama fries as they are cold, but the tofu fries are yummy! The bbq pizza is great and so are the bison burgers and Philly wraps. There are more options to make it healthier and gluten free. It's slightly pricey. I just wish America had more affordable places to eat healthier. But I think it's worth the price cause this is what you're putting into your body. Now if only they delivered ! ;)
Good price for food. But not much flavor in my opinion. Good for price though. Ambiance is done well. Looked like people loved the smoothies though. I'll try that next time if I go.

My first visit today and I ordered the buffalo wrap. The flavor was on point. So good I cannot even put it into words. I think I found .y new favorite spot. The only drawback..no paper menu to look at...had to ask about ingredients on several items before finally ordering.

What can I say except for healthy can be good! It's about time I try to get a hold on my health and Protein and Greens provide a great variety of food and drinks to help you on your journey. 

Menu item are kinda pricey as expected but it's not cheap to feel and look good. But you can either pay now for healthy food option or later with your health. 

Regardless if you do try them out you won't be disappointed. I order the Cali Wrap with spinach tortilla and no added avocado but the whole meal with tofu fries was under 300 cal. What? Unheard of. The wrap was big filled with yummy grilled chick a bit dry but flavorful. Tofu fries was crispy and on point I didn't miss the potato. I got the green shake with almond milk which was good and creamy. They also have awesome cucumber lemon water which was refreshing. 

All that was $19.99 like I said a bit pricey for one meal but worth every penny.  The staff was super friendly and the restaurant was uber hip. I'm a new fan and will come back for more!

I ordered a turkey burger and asked for the turkey not to be overcooked, guess what I think they over cook it on purpose, heard negative comments from staff. I know turkey is not eaten raw, but it shouldn't be dry either.  I remember when they first opened and it was the best place, now... not so much.

If you're looking to indulge without feeling any guilt, Greens and Proteins is the perfect spot to stop by.

The Greek Pizza is ridiculously good and leaves you feeling absolutely satisfied.  It consists of house made hummus, tomatoes, cucumbers, calamata olives, basil, mozzarella, and crumbled feta cheese. Eat the whole thing. It's not difficult, I promise.

My friend opted for the California Grilled Chicken Wrap which was just as good. It has lettuce, tomatoes, turkey bacon, and extra virgin mayo.

Give this place a try if you're looking for a light lunch or a quick bite without the remorse.

As far as the food goes they have a lot of healthy and tasty options from sandwiches to salads to tacos, smoothies, and juices. However, My experience wasn't that pleasant. There was only one gal around on the register and the phone, understandably taking a big order so I patiently waited. Someone else came out who let me know I would be helped in one moment and as soon a the gal got off the phone she didn't acknowledge me and walked away. I ended up being helped and he was polite and guided my through the menu but the same woman dropped off my food and again wouldn't acknowledge me when I said, "thank you." To top it off, the sweet potato fries were only slightly warm. 

I understand that sometimes things get a little hectic but it really made my experience unpleasant.

I love the other greens and protein. I even gave the one on Eastern 5 stars for their amazing customer service and food. I went to the new one on rainbow yesterday and it was weird. The server was very nice, but was having difficulty using their new system. Even the other person working seemed to find it confusing. It was pretty dead inside which is unusual for a Greens and Protein, but our food took forever. We didn't even get an acknowledgement or an apology for it taking so long. I believe the other people that were there might have known the owners or managers because kids of theirs were running around and going in and out of the back room. Also, a dog was barking. We couldn't tell if it was from the back office or kitchen, but we're hoping it wasn't the kitchen. The food was still great, but everything else made me uncomfortable.
Drinks are not consistent some have more then then at other times. Sometimes just foam at top. Other than that, it tasted great.

Omg i love this place. The food and drinks are always on point. People are very nice. I usually go around lunch and its pretty packed so it may take a while to get your food, but the food always makes up for it. I like to venture out and try new things here from the menu! So far I have likes everything I've tried.

Cesar was so nice! I think he's the head chef. 
We eat here all the time. There was a mistake with a dish, and he went above and beyond to remedy it. Great place with great survive! Thank you so much!
I love everything I've drank and eaten at this place! Fresh, clean, healthy!
My friend Andie and I both love this place. Perfect post workout meal. The sweet potato fries and wraps are really good choices
For healthy low calorie food, it is delicious! The customer service from employees is outstanding!

I've eaten here a couple time's great fresh tasting food and very healthy.
the Low Carb Caesar Salad With Grilled Chicken Breast is the best salad i've ever had.
Tofu fries! The yummiest snack! Especially while I'm studying! Also their wellness drinks are amazing especially after a good workout

Everything about this place is amazing. You can leave here feeling full and not guilty for having just eaten  that. The food is not only healthy but tastes amazing. It's top notch in my book.  I've tried pretty much everthing  on the menu from there burgers to there wraps and I'm quite impressed.  I love this place.
Came in here for a pick up order, food was amazing! Had the angus burger with potatoe fries.

I still come here just for the food because there is nothing else close that offers healthY options. The staff is standoffish. I don't know if it's because it's 7a and they don't want to be there or what. But if you can, go to the Eastern location. Everyone there is so much more friendly and welcoming.

I love this place. I've had the wellness drink, ginger limeade, the veggie pizza and veggie burger. The variety of health food choices they have is very broad and it's a great spot for anyone with specific dietary needs. Easy slot for picky health eaters as well. Food tastes great!
Great options, fairly priced. Got an apple pie smoothie, was good texture, wish it was just a bit sweeter
Absolutely delicious. I had the veggie burger and was blown away. Helpful and friendly staff.

I love this place. I'm a physique competitor so I usually cook my own food during a contest prep. However, my wife and I were out looking for a place to grab something that fit my dietary needs and it came down to Protein House or Greens and Proteins. We went into Protein House and looked at their menu but nothing jumped out to us. Further, I didn't like that they don't have macronutrient  information on their menu at Protein House. 

So we headed to Greens and Proteins and were pleased as always. Prepared how I would prepare it at home but it's cooked by someone else so it's better! . The food really is delicious so I highly recommend that if you haven't been there, you go!

Delicious but I want more vegan options. It's really disappointing and kind of frustrating when the place is marketed as a vegan restaurant but there's only one or two things that I can actually order. I would love to have more options
short and sweet this place is awesome! the wellness drink is great and the tofu fries were a nice surprise! if I had one of these places close to home I would come here every day!

This is a great place to eat healthy meals and the smoothies are delicious. They have, electrical outlets and you can sit outside which is nice. The atmosphere is cool and management is friendly and helpful.
Wellness drink my absolute fav!!! I tried the veggie burger & although it is made fresh...it was a little dry. Needs some hummus or some type of cilantro pesto something....overall I'm a fan!

I had the Albacore Salad, it was good but the Ginger Limeade is wonderful. Packed with spinach, ginger, and sweetened with frozen green grapes. I was very surprised with the juice flavor combinations here. My order was not complicated but they staff was fast and very nice. It is a bit pricey for a quick lunch but I would treat myself again and maybe try a burger.

I was skeptical about going here because I thought it would be flavorless since its so healthy... This place is REALLY GOOD!! I havent had anything that wasnt good yet, I would go here more often if it was closer.  I really like the Bison Wrap and the Margarita Pizza but the pizza to get is the BBQ Chicken Pizza!!

I was really excited to try this place finally because of all the great Yelp reviews.  Unfortunately I wasn't excited when I finally went and checked out the prices.  You get what you pay for, right? Eh.

This was a stop after yoga - I thought it would be nice to have a low-calorie fruit smoothie to come back to reality before going home and cooking/cleaning.  I ordered the Loaded Antioxidant Chiller - green grapes, blueberries, blackberries, agave nectar (188 cal).

The lady at the cash register seemed pretty indifferent, so I can't say if it was good or bad service. Indifferent service? Sure. It was a bit of a wait for JUST a smoothie when there were only 2 or 3 people ahead of me.  The atmosphere is nice at least - I do enjoy the indoor waterfall wall and natural tables.

Got my smoothie and left.  The taste was good - nothing to really OMG over - but I don't think it was almost $6 something good - and that was with my $1 off Yelp check-in!

I dunno, maybe I need to order food but the prices are a HUGE turn-off.  The yummy pictures of tofu fries may bring me back.  Stay tuned...

I was very impressed with this place! I am new to Vegas and was looking to try a few places like this in the area. 

There's a similar establishment across the parking lot. However, I went there and enjoyed the food but the staff was rude. 

Greens and Protein had both delicious, nutrient dense food and extremely friendly and helpful staff. I was sitting outside and a manager was leaving to go home. He said goodbye to all three tables on his way out. Small things like that earn my business back every time!

I also love that the menu includes caloric values which is helpful to me on a contest prep diet. 

Highly recommend!

I hate to give this place a 2 star rating but i have to do that now , we stopped coming here because of customer service being a little rude when we asked why they are out of items and constantly (95%) of the time being "out" of an item , always out of the various soups that are now no longer on the menu , out of shake/smoothie items , out of various other items as well that honestly made it very difficult to order something. We stopped coming here for about 6 months or more and finally wanted to give it another try and we came back , same basic problems, new items out this time there new "thai chicken bowl" which was actually recommended over the phone they were out . 

I understand this is a problem with dealing with some types of items but it honestly makes it annoying to have to call in and check if half the menu is available before i come in . 

I will say the managers are typically really nice and one girl who we see all the time working is also nice so that's good for sure but not sure we will be returning.

Does this look like an a√ßa√≠ bowl to you? Worst bowl I've had from anywhere. There weren't any strawberries the granola was soggy and they even put raisins in it! Who puts raisins and pineapple in an a√ßa√≠ bowl? I don't even know what the slush at the bottom was.

This is place is the best!! Generally I'm never looking to be out of town for work and having to find cool and healthy place to eat but someone recommended Greens and Proteins to me and that's the best food recommendations i heard in a long long time! When i looked at the menu it took me 5 minutes to decide what i wanted cause everything looked so good and i could eat here every meal for 2 weeks without having to eat twice the same thing so i could try everything that looks good! And not only it looks good on the menu but the food is equally amazing!! If you're looking for healthy food that taste amazing look no further, this is it! You can thank me later! On top of that the staff is super friendly and the place is squeaky clean! My only regret is that they're only Vegas based so far, please, please Greens and Proteins needs to open some locations in LA (Woodland Hills maybe lol) cause people would love it there! If you like Whole Foods you're gonna love this place!!!

Happy to have found this place! Everything on the menu is great but my favorite is the seared tuna salad. Their juices are super yummy and the berry one is my favorite. 

It's hard to find a great health spot around here that doesn't just sell smoothies. Oh and hello they have bowls and metal utensils!! Love it.

Staff is all super friendly and they have great suggestions. Especially about the smoothies. I haven't tried the Bison yet but oh it's going to happen. 

Only downfall is the atmosphere is kinda quite and cold. A little uninviting maybe? Idk honestly it could have been the time of day I go. But I will keep coming back to this place regardless because their food is super good and super good for you!
Honestly everything I have had in here has been delicious; I really like the menu and I love their wraps and salads.  It's just good food.
Love this place. Good & fresh food!! Salmon & saut√©ed broccoli. Their sweet potato fries is also so good. Not to mention their juices are so fresh & satisfying. I'm always craving one!

Food was overpriced and the cashier didn't explain that the juices were not "juiced" but broken down by a masticating machine. So we had a full on conversation about posting that information up. Gave this place a 2 because the owner was somewhat accommodating. I didn't enjoy my juice at all, so they have me a bottled water. So, I basically bought a $5 bottle of water and some egg whites and ground turkey sausages that took 15 minutes to make. Mind you, I was one out of two customers.

Would have given a 4 or 5 star rating but for the one big issue I had. I ordered the Bison Wrap and specifically requested "NO GREEN PEPPERS"!!!
I get my wrap and the first thin I see is that it's full of green peppers... SMH
Sent it back and they made me a new one. It was yummy.

I figured it's about time I write a review! I come to greens about everyday sometimes twice a day.. to the point that the staff on every shift know who I am by name,  there is not one thing I have tried on the menu I didn't love. And I've tried breakfast, lunch, small pickings, salads pretty much everything. My favorites on the menu are,  pancakes, scrambled egg and turkey sausage, turkey breast, bell peppers and their sweet potato fries are life!!!! They have all the macros for the food so it's really easy to fit into your day. And the owner and staff are amazing! If you haven't already go.  You won't regret it

yummy! I love this place! Sadly, my husband is not into it as much as I am so I can only go there by myself...or when I force him to go with me :) Yeah some of the stuff are not as tasty as others. Learn what you like from the menu and then you will be just fine.

Not much more can add to reviews with Greens and Proteins...right? Oh but there one thing that stands out BIG time that must give out  yelp love. The main reason got bumped up to five star! I have been the other location on my side of town. Wow! The food am sure just as good (on this visit only came in for recovery smoothie aka went with Green Leaf Berry Blast) as the other location. I have always been fan of with the healthy choices. The prices can be pricey but in this case your getting the quality you pay for and they have nice diversity of options. The WOW factor for me. The interior design was SOOOOO much more pleasant then the other location. Maybe its because I believe this is the mother ship or the first one in Vegas. So the interior design is totally pimped out with personality and makes you want too come back rather then the bland blah interior of the other location. Here so many things that stands out soon as walked in. The fake waterfall coming down on the wall, the green chairs, couple wide screens places next to the waterfalls, and everywhere look love the interior design. The fountain area with the cucumber water dispenser adds nice touch then your normal fountain station area. The customer service is fabulous. I jus wished they could have flip flop the interior design to the one closer my side of town then I would be duke. Lol!

Not bad at all!! This healthy food chain is pretty fantastic. It is super clean, service is friendly, and the food is good. They have their calorie counts clearly listed, and tons of options! I was actually pretty overwhelmed by all of the choices. Most items average close to $10, so this isn't the cheapest lunch spot, but all things considered (including the refreshing-and free- cucumber water), I can't gripe about spending a few extra dollars.

Would have gotten 5 stars if the guy at the register didn't mess up my meal. He charged me twice for a build your own meal. I called and noticed the charge, and he told me to come in next time so he can take care of it. When I came in, I asked to have my meal he said he was gna take care of, and I added a 6 dollar soup. He charged me for my whole meal and told me soup was taken care of. No you moron, as a courtesy of good customer service for messing up my meal before, you should take care of my 12 dollar meal. And I'll pay for my 6 dollar soup separately. Idiot.

Ok...so sorry it's been a while. Just noticed the owner is REALLY on top of things. (I'm just now seeing a old response). The location on Rainbow is amazing. I never used the coupon but don't need to. I've found my spot & I will continue to go there. I have to get my tofu fries! Yum! Thank you to the owner once again for being so passionate about his business!
Great food and friendly service.  The Eastern location is difficult to get in and out of especially in rush hour traffic.  But, well worth it!

I eat at Greens and Proteins two or three times a week.  My favorite is the Margharita Pizza on lavash.   It is awesome!!!  Great pizza with very little calories (I think they said 300!!!!). 

Looking for a nice healthy drink from their juice bar? The Green Shake with almond milk is ridiculous!!!  If you want more of a pure juice there's nothing better than the Wellness Drink...

They just started doing breakfast and their Tofu and chicken sausage wrap is awesome.  I don't ever eat Tofu but the chef made me a deal. He said if the Tofu in the wrap was not as good or better than egg whites he would give me my money back.  I'm hooked!!!  Healthy AND good breakfast???  Saweeeeet!

Really really love this place!!! I'm busy and don't have a lot of time to cook but like to eat healthy! This place is not only healthy it's delicious...I eat here a few times a week and I alway get the best service and a great meal quickly. Can't wait until they open more locations...like right by my office ;)

I just placed an order for the teriyaki bowl, vegan style (no meat) and I got home to find it full of chicken. I asked the person I ordered from if it could be vegan style and she said yes.  I had to throw the whole bowl away.

Well... I seem to have forgotten that healthy things don't taste as good as deep fried not healthy things.  

I stopped by on my lunch because I wanted a smoothie to sip on throughout the afternoon at work.  When I walked in, I immediately liked the environment.  Everything was open and clean.  There was only one person in front of me, who was finishing paying.  She and the man behind the register were having a friendly conversation... that continued for quite some time and in to the time where she was waiting for her food.  I was only slightly annoyed since I was on a time constraint.

I ended up ordering the Green Leaf Berry Blast with soy because it sounded both delicious and tasty.  Upon receiving it, I was surprised at its brownish color (which later understandably turned green due to the veggies in it).   My first sip was a shocker... I was not a fan.  I drink soy milk all the time in replacement of regular milk.  There was just a taste that reminded me of liquid Maalox.  I honestly think that my choice on the menu was just a poor one and I would have been better off with a juice.  Next time, I will definitely opt for one of those.  I feel bad that I wasted over $8, but I've definitely learned my lesson!

First visit: caffeinated smoothie. TERRIBLE. You think it'd be good, combining two of my favorite things. Think again! 

Second visit: berry smoothie. Still not a good flavor. Plus, my friend order a small cheese pizza for her four year old (no kids menu options). Pizza came out wrong. They were nice and quickly fixed the situation after minor pushback. 

Overall- overpriced and overrated. I wish we had better smoothie place options in this area for post gym snacks!

Delicious and way healthy for what I'm used to! I guess that's a good thing after having giving birth to a baby boy and slacking off on the workout. It kinda makes me want to go back to the  gym. Had the granola French toast and wellness drink. Hubby got the p&g breakfast burrito..yum! All tastey and good, but way too pricey for my drink and toast was a bit soggy. Thank god for groupons!!!

so good - and as long as you eat within reason, its great for those who are keeping to a clean diet. I also like how they have all the calorie counts on everything so you know exactly what you're going to ingest. :)

I love that Greens and Proteins is a health-conscious restaurant that offers vegetarian/vegan options! . 

The food is amazing and the customer service is excellent! I love the G&P veggie burger, tofu fries, grilled vegetable wrap, hummus and pita, the build your own meal, (with tofu, edamame, sweet potato mash and aged balsamic reduction) acai bowl, granola crusted french toast, pancakes, and the banana bread, made with walnuts and chocolate chips! ANNOUNCEMENT: They are now serving sweet potato fries - yum! I LOVE that they do not fry any meat or fish, which prevents cross contamination for those who have dietary concerns. 

My meat-eating fiance likes the mini Ahi tostadas, Ahi protein salad, the California grilled chicken wrap and all of the above! He has yet to try a burger but they have only been open for a couple of weeks. We still have more to try!

I have been trying to eat healthier and be more aware of my portions, especially with the wedding around the corner. It is extremely helpful to have an idea of how many calories I am consuming per meal. However, I have let them know they should add the calorie count for the tofu fries - for consistency, of course. No joke, but I have been losing some weight after working out, along with eating a couple of meals here per week.

It is safe to say, I am a bit obsessed. Enjoy!

*New location in North Las Vegas. Please see my review.

Finally, there is a nearby, health-conscious restaurant that offers vegetarian/vegan options! The location is a bit tricky, as it is located across from Del Taco and not within the direct LVAC parking lot as stated on menus found at other locations, along with their own. I would highly suggest a "Grand Opening" sign if at all possible to help gain more customers. 

The food is amazing and the customer service is excellent! I love the G&P veggie burger, tofu fries, grilled vegetable wrap, hummus and pita, the build your own meal, (with tofu, edamame, sweet potato mash and aged balsamic reduction) acai bowl, granola crusted french toast, multi-grain protein pancakes, and the banana bread, made with walnuts and chocolate chips! ANNOUNCEMENT: They are now serving sweet potato fries - yum! I LOVE that they do not fry any meat or fish, which prevents cross contamination for those who have dietary concerns. 

My meat-eating fiance likes the mini Ahi tostadas, Ahi protein salad, the California grilled chicken wrap and all of the above! He has yet to try a burger but they have only been open for a couple of weeks. We still have more to try!

I have been trying to eat healthier and be more aware of my portions, especially with the wedding around the corner. It is extremely helpful to have an idea of how many calories I am consuming per meal. However, I have let them know they should add the calorie count for the tofu fries - for consistency, of course. No joke, but I have been losing some weight after working out, along with eating a couple of meals here per week.

It is safe to say, I am a bit obsessed. Enjoy!

The foods great and It's great to see vegan options on the menu, but recently when I called in my order of a veggiechino smoothie (delicious!) I was told it would be ready in 5 mins, when I got there to pick up my order it wasn't ready and I ended up waiting 20 mins before I left smoothie-less and disappointed. The foods really really great, they just need a little work on their customer service.

I went back to the restaurant to give it another chance , this time I went there with my boyfriend the service was great and the food this time was EXCELLENT I loved my salad & my boyfriend loved the burger & the humus we will absolutely come back yum.

Got the bbq pizza and it was great! But I hope they don't cLose that earLy 'cause a Lot of peopLe are stiLL coming in and got turned down. Got there 15mins before cLosing and they said they stiLL accept orders but aLL the chairs are aLready up. and you can teLL the cooks are upset.

Great service, coffee is good and hot, breakfast is amazing AND healthy.  Do yourself a favor in Vegas and take a break from the buffets - come to Greens and Proteins at one of their 5 locations.  You'll be glad you did!

I am never disappointed.  Clean, healthy and delicious food.  The owner is friendly, as well as the staff.  A little pricey, but a nice treat  for every once in a while....ahem, week.  Oh, and I love the decor.  Feels open and bright.

I like the idea of healthy food as an alternative to the usual fast food fair, but they always take so long and the food is just not that good. I like the menu but I feel like they could add a bit more flavor. The healthy food I make at home tastes good, their food is quite bland.

I love this place great food, great empolyees I come in regularly and they are nice enough to remember my name and greet me with a smile. They never fail to make me feel welcomed thank you guys! Keep up the good work!

My husband and I stopped here on our way home to California and I fell in love!
They have a fantastic menu full of good for you food!
I wanted to badly to eat something, but I had eaten about an hour before I went but we did want juice.
I got a ginger limeade and it was fantastic! 
Only reason I gave 4 not 5 stars is that it's a bit pricey, but with what they use I get it.
Next time I am in Vegas I will definitely be going back!

Really savory food, great customer service and overall we were all pleasantly surprised. We ordered 2 kids burgers, a salmon plate and the cheese stake sandwich. Oh' also ordered the hummus plate, not my favorite.

Portions were fantastic, great tasting food and portions were pretty satisfying.

Keep it rolling guys. We'll definetly come back!

Yummy, healthy and clean tasting food. It is so nice to have a place like Greens and Proteins near my office! Online ordering was fast, easy and my food was ready to go when I arrived. Definitely recommend!

This is my all-time favorite place for healthy eats. I have never been disappointed and I eat here a couple times a month. Although I am not a vegetarian, their black bean burger is amazing. I really like the bison wrap as well and their turkey chili. Eating healthy for the average person isn't typically fun, but this place changes things! Try the sweet potato fries as your side with any order, they're my favorite!

Cool Premise, very trendy, free wifi.  

I enjoyed the premise of the place.... Greens... and ... wait for it... Proteins...   

I really enjoyed their tea sampling, unsweetened of course.  

I had the bison burger wrap, which was delicious.  I had the tofu fries, which I did not care for.  I should have went with the alternative, yucca fries.  

The atmosphere is cool, friendly people working, healthy people eating, and then me..  who typically goes for taco bell, but was slumming it for a day with the healthy people leaving LVAC.  

Overall, a cool place with great offerings and free wifi.
Food is always great, but called order for SALAD 30 minutes ago and it's still not ready.

My favorite spot when we're looking to eat clean. Normally get the angus burger in a lettuce wrap (they always cook it at the right temp as ordered).  Get the chicken satay for starters (that all natural peanut sauce is amazing).  I've pretty much tried all the pizzas there and they are all very light and satisfying.  Highly recommend the protein pancakes when you're bulking up.

Greens is my everyday lunch spot. There are so many options. I never get bored. Tofu fries, extra crispy, the bison wrap or the low calorie Caesar salad with salmon are to die for. Never thought eating healthy could be so yummy and addicting. Love this place!!!

Very impressed by the quality, taste, and portion size of their Bison wrap sandwich. (Excited to try the Ostrich wrap next time.) The Tofu Fries were a fun and tasty alternative to french fried potatoes. Again, really generous portion. Every juice and smoothie I've had has been really good - I would suggest asking the juice-maker on staff which one she/he recommends based on your likes and dislikes. They will suggest one and dial it in for you. 

The food may be a dollar or two more than a comparable cafe-style restaurant, but you truly get it back in terms of portion size and quality. It takes one visit to realize this.

And, the staff actually looks healthy here. That says a lot!

Wish I lived closer. Will definitely eat here next time I'm at Eastern/215 for the Cars & Coffee car meetup on Saturdays.

FYI, there seem to be 'green' health cafe imitators popping up around the Valley. Try Greens and Proteins first - this place is the real deal. Greens and Proteins reminds me of R Thomas in Atlanta (a 24hr health food cafe) and that is a compliment. 

Also, there is free Wi-fi here, and I noticed power outlets all along the back booths (like over 40 outlets in a row) so this would be a great alternative to a coffee shop if you need to hunker down and get some laptop work done.
This place was AWESOME! We got the BBQ pizza and chicken sausage pizza. Sooo good! Service was great as well.

Got the green leaf berry smoothie. It was horrible. Didn't say anything until a worker asked how it was. I bluntly said, "This tastes like sh*t." Which it did because the worker said it doesn't even look the right color. He then asked if he could make it right. I asked if he could make me a peanut butter banana instead. He came back with a better tasting concoction. Way to do service recovery. Thumbs up to Kevin (the worker who saved the night.)

Update: All I drank after the gym was the shakes. I ended up tasting them again...Something in those drinks just didn't agree with me. My girlfriend has the chorizo wrap and didn't have any issues. She enjoyed it and didn't get sick.
I'm sorry but if you like bland smoothies, you're at the right spot.  We ordered ginger lemonade and watermelon raspberry and we tasted was ice.  Not worth the money for something so tasteless.

So excited they serve the vegan impossible burger meat here. We tried it in their vegan cheese steak and it's freaking incredible. It's a must try. 

Also had the vegan BBQ chick'n pizza which was super tasty.

Thank you for offering more vegan options. We will be back!

Great location here in the same plaza as LVAC. The food is average pricing, but I think the drinks are a bit pricey (over $8 for a juice drink)... but I guess with the quality ingredients, it can be expensive to be healthy, right? Got the Wellness drink (can't remember the exact name) and at first I wasn't a fan, but it tasted better with each sip, plus super healthy. They do have a good menu with drinks, breakfast options, and wraps/sandwiches/etc.

I used to frequent the one in Henderson in Eastern, but since changing jobs I decided to check out the Summerlin location. It was fairly easy to find, though my GPS tried to steer me through a gated community and out a non-existent exit. The place was clean and had a decent crowd at lunch time. We didn't have to wait long for our food. They forgot to give my friend her number for her food, so we did have to ask about that. Also, I always think they are pricey. The food is good though, I never have any complaints there. We had tacos, chicken and steak, and my favorite hummus plate. I keep coming back and paying because it is consistently good. I'm glad I found a new location by my new offices.

The Wellness Juice is by far the best juice I've ever had in my life! My toddlers went crazy for it and drank so much of it! I love that you can get a pizza, or a healthy salad, all in one location. I've never tasted anything from here that I didn't absolutely love.

Great place for a quick bite. Super fresh but a bit pricey (you get what you pay for). Ordered their turkey burger with a side of tofu fries. Burger had A LOT of meat and tofu was cooked/seasoned perfectly. Definitely want to try out some of their fresh juices next time!

The staff is very friendly, and I love the atmosphere! 

You have to try the tofu fries and any of the pizzas!!

They also have exotic meets like ostrich and bison burgers! 

Mm mm try the cucumber lemon water.

I have been meaning too get this off my bookmark tonight finally did. I always heard about the location on the opposite end of world for me. Once learned about there newest location excited about chance too get my Greens and Proteins on. I no means hardcore comes too healthy eating but generally try all my meals healthy. Truly is no place better in Vegas comes too healthy menu. Literally they breakdown the calories on just about every menu item. Offer Build Your Own Custom Meal pick your proteins, greens, grains, and sauces. Again they have everything broken down too calories. It was my first time daunting too pick choose as my first taste. I kind of in the mood of burger so went with the Ostrich Burger and try so got the 7 Vegetable Broccoli Cheese Soup. 

The soup was good. It nothing Wow factor but overall solid soup. It nice creamy base soup but had nice thickness and full body with the cheese (assume cheddar they use. The color really nice. Times order any vegetable soup not have that vibrant or look like vegetable. Soup was right on. Nice HOT!!

The Ostrich Burger was delicious. I believe one first times having it. It lean meat. So thinking might be dried out but still moist and had nice flavor. The garnishes of lettuce and tomatoes really fresh looking added too my burger. The sides lot too choose from but went with the fried tofu. I scared at first. I enjoy tofu but not seasoned right just bland. The fried tofu was hit for me. It had nice seasonings on the outside and enjoy the aioli dipping sauce for them. They also offer Bison as protein. I see that in my future...

They cook everything too order so takes time but very much worth the wait. The only thing not fan of is the interior is REALLY boring. I understand still relatively new but plain white walls all around and not much of vibe inside. It loses appeal waiting but once you get your food more then MAKES up for it. It kind of pricey menu. Still not going too hold me back try more of the menu.

What can I say about Greens and Proteins?? I can tell you always been fan and this marks the third location in Vegas. I can tell you that every location the food has been spot on. They have a nice diversity of healthy options, whole create your own menu section, options for smoothies really enjoy, and never had bad meal. I ended up getting the Turkey Club Wrap with tofu fries. I think might have been the first time getting wrap. The best parts about it was instead of the normal wrap went with the spinach wrap. Talk about giving the wrap not only different flavor and look! I thought was prefect compliment for the whole dish. It had ample amount of turkey and love the dressing mixed in with the greens some fresh tomato. It nice size wrap one that filling. The tofu fries. Fried tofu especially hard tofu. Beautiful thing. It not only healthier but taste better then fries, Not at all greasy. It crispy on the outside and soft on the inside. I could order whole basket of fries if I cold. The seasoning they out on the tofu is addicting.

You can tell not only from the sign that just opened plus get first review. LOL! It feels new, smells new, and things that tradition with the signage and logo. I believe this is the only location that the menu its electronic. I know the smoothies looked even more tasty. It rolls over couple times or least once. Each time keep showing different smoothie on the menu. It making me thirsty waiting or thinking about what am going order for lunch. I like the menu. They sell different nutrition bars Q-West bars to couple other brands. The cucumber water nice touch. Me not really fan of but hear it not only healthy but not many places that offer it. I would say probably about the same size as the other two locations. 

The service nothing but five stars for me. They greeted us right after entering, offered help with the menu if needed it, friendly, and love the positive vibes. The best part about third location is super close to the house. So now truly if ever need Greens and Proteins fix literally bike down the street or five min drive. Nice option too have in life!! =))))

Their food and smoothies are great to have after a good workout!! Their fruits/veggies are fresh not frozen!! :) I actually had to ask them to remake my smoothie because it was kind of runny - but the second one they remade for me was perfect!

This place is very good. I had the vegan burger and I'm not normally a fan of anything vegan but this burger hit the spot. The prices are little bit pricey but not to bad. The atmosphere is pretty hip and trendy. I definitely recommend trying this place.

Out with my vegan food companion so options were limited. I assumed we were going to munch sugary lettuce, force down processed fake meats and cheeses and maybe power through weird dense bread. Being in this mindset, Greens and Proteins was a pleasant surprise. Nicely decorated yet still casual. Warning: watering system for the wall plants make a startling sound.

Parking is a piece of cake. It's in the same plaza as the athletic club and starbucks.

The ordering system is like Jason's Deli. Order/pay then they give you a number. Then they bring your food to you. They bus the tables too so don't awkwardly stand holding your refuse while darting your eyes around like I did.

I ordered a small caesar salad. It was huge. I couldn't finish it. It was standard taste. Also had a green ginger limeade. It was a whopping $5.99. It was dense, flavorful, refreshing and pleasant. But the thing I have to come back for are the "tofu fries." They were thick, fried strips of tofu. Not caked in batter. Not oily. Just dusted in spice. 

The only downsides were weird meathead customers and it's a little expensive. You should try it!
Told about this place from fellow gym mates...turns out they were right. Excellent food and good service. Would recommend to anyone.
Good healthy food, fast friendly service,and right by the gym, what else do you want?

This is a nice place to go if you're looking for something healthy and relatively quick. I had the emu burger, and it was awesome, and the juices were really outstanding. I really like that they post all of the calories on the menu so you know what's in your food. The con, it's really quite pricey, 6+ $ for smoothies/drinks, and sandwiches start at about 10$. It would be easy to have a 25$ lunch by yourself here. Noticed they are however vegan, vegetarian and HCG diet friendly.

Ok here's my review after 4 times eating here....the owner was genius for putting it in a place where after a workout....its this or Starbucks....and giving that extra closing time for late night snacks after strength training....BUT HOWEVER....that's how I got caught here more than I would like to.i give 3 stars for location,hours,menu,and decor....I DO NOT GIVE more stars for the over priced UNDER flavored meals I've had...Tofu fries....PERFECTO'....juices & smoothies...nothing special and go raw cafe bears them with drinks by a long shot....the food costs way too much money to have to go home and re flavor. Rumor has it....don't quote me....they cook vegan dishes on the same equipment as meat dishes without cleaning....I DO NOT KNOW if this is 100% true,but I've heard and read about it too much to not mention. I'm trying the veggie burger right now and hopeful it stands up to its price range. I really want to love this image....the harvest kale salad was a joke,veggie pizza (vegan) decent,but over priced. Please owner.....step your game up...I want to be yur fav customer....I need you lol
