First time here today as we just moved up north and after running many errands for the house, needed some food. The menu is a bit intimidating for first timers, but the girls at the register were extremely helpful!  BF ordered the chicken tortilla soup and a cheese quesadilla. I had the veggie burger and sweet potato fries with a watermelon strawberry juice. Everything was delicious and filling. So much so that I did not have dinner and we ate about 2pm.  We will definitely be back as there are sooooo many other things I'd like to try.

Heaven for health fanatics who are also food enthusiasts! Conveniently located next to the LVAC and off 215, Greens & Proteins has delicious drinks, snacks, and meals for any time of the day. This casual restaurant is fitting for dine-in or take-out. 

There's so many options here that cater to ALL of your dietary needs and preferences-- you name it, they [probably] can do it! I LOVE their BBQ Chicken Pizza and also like their chicken cheese steak wrap and turkey burger with jicama or sweet potato fries. There's a good selection of smoothies and the Green Shake is another one of my favorites.

This location has indoor and patio seating available. Indoor usually is more quiet (I sometimes even do work here) and the patio is next to Starbucks' patio which is a bit loud but still adds to the atmosphere. If you're unable to make it out to this location, don't worry, there's other locations sprinkled all around Las Vegas valley area!
delicious healthy food.  worth a try if you're coming from lvac and don't want to ruin your whole workout!

As an update, the manager did call and spoke with me about it. He seemed sincere in trying to resolve the issue. We did order last week online again without issue, in fact, they gave us 'extra' on the drink since we added protein and it wouldn't all fit in the glass. Have ordered protein everytime and have never had that happen, it was a nice surprise. Changed my rating here to three stars for overall experience seemingly getting better.

Love their food. Can't go wrong there for any food fan & healthy eating. I like the fact their selection can be a part of my breakfast lunch or dinner. Now they have convenient locations. Making it even easy to dine there!

We eat at this location pretty often, the service is always fast and friendly. The clientele for the most part seems to be people coming after a work out at the LVAC across the way so the dress code is super casual. 
The build your own protein plate is the way to go for us. The salmon is always cooked perfect but the sizes of the pieces of salmon can vary a lot! I always get sliced avocado and mashed sweet potato as my sides with the balsamic dressing. Highly recommend!
For breakfast, the French toast is a favorite with my kids... they are crusted with granola. Yum!
I have tried a few of their smoothies and have enjoyed them all. 
The only downside is the prices. Be prepared to pay the price to eat healthier!

Lots of menu options and they give you a good filling amount of food.  Wraps, burgers, soups even lots of breakfast options and so many healthy and vegan options.  Great place I hope more locations open up.
Courteous staff and an owner who "loves" food.  Food that is both delicious and nutritious

Great food, just wish the prices were a little better. Maybe im cheap?? 

The cheesesteak cabbage wrap is a fav and we also like the build your own meals.

Kayla was extremely helpful and i was not sure on what i wanted to get and she walked me through not only her favorite meals but meals that would benefit my health. Definitely 5 stars from me and i will be coming more often

I have been waiting for this location to open up since the announcement earlier this year! I was so thrilled when they finally opened because it is near my work. I was unaware of the opening and luckily my coworker called to ask to see when they opened and luckily enough, it just happened to be the day when they had the soft opening.

I have been working in the food and beverage industry for a few years and I know how things work when a restaurant opens up. It has only been a couple of weeks since this location opened up and I have to say that they have been doing a great job accommodating to the clientele, This location is near a business center where major companies are located including: William Hill, Hakkassan and multiple law firms and physician firms. This location is busy! It may not be near a gym unlike the other two locations, but it is still pretty busy. I am impressed with the way the staff is working so hard to maintain great service for a new spot that has barely opened for less than a month. I have to give a shout out to Daniel and the rest of the team who constantly give their best to making a great dining experience!

I have been to the other locations and I have to say that the serving size in the location seems more than the other two. I feel like I am actually getting my money's worth here! I love building my own menu or ordering the food from the menu. The service, the food and the quality is consistent from the other two locations. There has never been a bad experience with me from the food or service. I am very happy that there is finally a location near where I live and where I work!

So far, this location is working very hard for a business to open up less than a month. Service is great, food tastes delicious and is consistent throughout. I know I will continuously go here!
This place is fantastic. Just great healthy food for a very good price. Most of the juice drinks are great and the bison patties are awesome!

We stopped in today to have a nice lunch since a week in Vegas never really lends to healthy eating.  The decor and atmosphere of the place was quite nice.  I had a buffalo strip meal and my wife had the Asian chicken wrap on lettuce.  She really enjoyed the wrap but the buffalo strips were extremely small in portion and did not have much seasoning.  The price was extremely high for the amount of food that was given.  All and all, a nice place for a quick and healthy lunch.

Place is really good and pretty healthy! They are really friendly here and extremely efficient. This is definitely one of my go to spots! Tyler is the man here!

Some of my favorites:

* Bison Cheesesteak Wrap (Spinach wrap) - My Favorite
* Chicken/Turkey Bacon/Avocado wrap - so good
* Green Shake - Really Good
* Salmon here is really good too
Their green vegie drink was amazing!  The atmosphere is was awesome with free wifi and lots of outlets!

My absolute new favorite place to go.  This is even better than Rachel's Kitchen (sorry - I still adore you).  Ingredients are clearly fresh and there is even a bit of love put into the sandwiches.

Big thumbs up for the calorie counts and online ordering.

I first thought this was a national chain as their branding and menu is spot on.  Wouldn't surprise me at all if Greens and Proteins takes over the world!

Greens n Proteins W. Flamingo & Grand Canyon  

After coming here a few times & not being disappointed 
I feel like it's the least I can do is to leave a review. 
Following along with the rest of the health nut community I've decided to start counting those  calories & macros. In my pursuit of this fun filled journey of Greens n Proteins I've found that when i can combine healthy food with flavor I become happy. From Juices to shakes . Wraps to bison cheese steaks potato fries to Quinoa Salads. Its definitely a place I leave feeling satisfied and not disgusted with myself! Their service has been great the 4-5 times I've been there. It can get busy at times and waiting for your food for 15 mins  can definitely be a possibility. 

Breakfast Favorites 

Tofu Soy Chorizo Burrito,Greek Scramble, 
Protein Pancakes, Tomato Mozzarella Basil Frittata 

Salad Favorites 

Skinny Chef Salad, Ahi Protein Salad, 


Other favorites : Buffalo Chicken Wrap , Bison Cheese Steak & The Wellness Smoothie!

After days of gorging on Vegas buffets and other unhealthy foods, we were craving something  healthy after a workout. We stumbled across this place and were delighted. They have four different kinds of pizza crust--we opted for thin crust with BBQ chicken. We also got a wellness shake, which was very good.

I went with my family, My dad found a piece of metal in his food. He could choke and something horrible could happen. First, the incompetent assistant manager answered me that it is normal to find a piece of metal in the food.What kind of place is this!!! And second, she lied saying that she was the manager trying to cover up what happen. Be aware about this place!!!

Paid my first visit to Greens and Proteins for a healthy bite to eat after a not so healthy day of eating. I ordered an order of the chicken satay and had managed to snag a few bites of my man's teriyaki chicken wrap. I wanted to try their smoothies or juices, but I convinced myself to settle with their complimentary cucumber water to drink. Frankly, I couldn't justify paying more for juice than I paid for my entr√©e. (Huge cheapo moment). 

I enjoyed my satay as it was a good amount of skewers and actually tasted like I had ordered them from a Thai restaurant. The wrap was okay... lacked a little flavor as I couldn't taste any sauce, but it wasn't bad. I liked the tofu fries I ordered along with it. 

One of the best parts was seeing all the pre/post workout LVAC members who entered and exited as we ate. This not only gave me more motivation to get my booty in the gym, but also showed that this business was thriving and providing great, healthy options for those in town. I love seeing a place with active "regulars." 

On my next visit, I hope not to be too cheap to not try the juices and smoothies. :)
My smoothie was good but the sandwich I ordered wasn't seasoned well and neither were the tofu fries. However, I would give this place another try.

Newer restaurant to the area, I had to try since their motto is "Healthy". 
I had the skinny chef salad with Ranch dressing - good salad for lunch. I got the small portion, I can only imagine how large the large portion is, so really impressed with the sizes. I'll definitely be going back to try more of the food and the juices. 
I do like the fact that instead of sugar, the sweetener choice for the juices is Agave Nectar. Not quite paleo, but a better option than sugar. 
My only comment is I wish they had a grass-fed burger and organic veggie options.

The smoothies are delicious! Customer service is good and the food is passable. Although, my boyfriend ordered the Buffalo Chicken Strips and the sauce was a little too spicy. I also preferred more berries on the Summer Berry Salad I ordered. (But), regardless of our personal preference on the food, it was well worth the money we spent. I will definitely return.
Healthy never tasted so good! I'm still not sure I didn't consume 1000 calories it was so delicious. The ingredients are so fresh, totally chill atmosphere, and the prices were great!
Absolutely delicious and consistent. Will continue to go again & again. Anything bison here is on point lol

GAINZ HEAVEN! So jealous of Las Vegas for having this little gem, and especially jealous of LVAC members for having this place in the same center! If only my own gym had a nearby spot that offered even HALF of what Green & Proteins offers, I would be happy. The menu is outstanding, carrying more options than a girl can handle. Each item lists the nutritional facts of the meal, ensuring you know exactly what you are feeding your body! I couldn't ask for more. My muscles are happy and my tastebuds are definitely not complaining!

I had high expectation traveled 10 minutes in taxi there n back $30 round trip wasn't worth it at all- staff were nice smoothies good food disgusting left feeling yuck.
Won't be returning.

I must say, This place is BETTER than Waba Grill!!! Service here is fast no wait at all! Wish there was one out here in California. Tried this place thanks to a friend and I fell in love with bison cheesesteak wrap! Definitely worth more than 5 stars!
My favorite place for a healthy meal and know that I put something good in my body.  Bison burger with tofu is what I usually order , it's a bit pricy tho .

Great restaurant with an amazing concept fusing super healthy organic with a medium type /Upper class-fast food Service. They have multiple locations however I have found the flamingo location the most consistent when it comes accurate meal preparation. The majority of the menu is set up so that you can pick your own protein greens and carbs individually and is very nice for people that like food cooked their particular way. You can tell when the owner is not at the store location-However if you bring it to their attention that they messed up on your order they give you a wonderful attitude and often replace the meal/but always try to make good.

Greens and Proteins overall is always great, but the Flamingo location is really excellent.  The staff is always very nice, friendly and helpful with the menu.  The dining area is clean, stocked and well kept.  The chairs are a little uncomfortable, but that's only because I'd prefer to lay on a couch after my workouts.

Went to Greens and protein last night wanted a protein Burger lettuce wrap they were out of lettuce last time they were out of avocado they were out of ingredients on pizzas that they served no cilantro for the barbecue chicken pizza they change pizza crust it's terrible I got the build your meal with the bison burger they destroyed it$16 wow

You come here for a reason...lifestyle food that is not available at most places.  It is no coincidence that it is located next to LVAC.  Greens and Proteins has lots of high protein meats, low-fat options, vegetarian options, vegan options, good grains, and gluten free options to fit several lifestyle diets.

I am a fan of their buffalo meat steak & cheese wrap and their green shake specifically, but if you're looking for the types of food offered here it is easy to find something on the menu.  They also provide caloric and fat content info on their menu.

Don't come here if you are not into lifestyle food.  It will most likely disappoint.  There are plenty of tasty items for all types of eater, but you're paying a little more here because of the type of food.  Also, several of the healthy options are a bit bland...ie jicama fries.  It is still a solid place that is filling a niche and doing it pretty well.

LOVE this location!! Amanda and her team are fantastic. The food is always awesome and prompt, the place is always clean and customers always look happy! Wish this place was in California, but it's a perk of coming to Vegas!!!

I really love the options here! 

The food quality and flavor is really amazing! The only think I need to mention is that some of the time I order there my orders are not always right. Even so, I will continue to go here!

Delicious spot for lunch - lots of healthy options with easy modifications to get it just how you like it.  Perfect for those of us who are careful or picky about what we eat and often annoy servers with special requests. Everything I tried (from both my order and my husbands) was fantastic! Don't skip the sweet potato fries.
Always a good choice if you're looking for a healthier meal option. I got the buffalo chicken wrap and it was delicious! I get their smoothies as well and they are great.

Service was slow, eggs not crispy at edges and firm in center when ordering over hard.  I love oatmeal and this place charged more for it than starbucks next door.   Next doors starbucks had better tasting n consistency oatmeal at half the price.  The plates are large, but the food rather bland.   I just can't see eating here again.  I can see eating next door at Starbucks again.  Also, don't check in on yelp here.  The service are oblivious to the discount.  Overpriced place with bad food and a nice name.  I think it would have been healthier to not eat than eat here, despite the nice healthy name.

Awesome place for healthy and flavorful food. I usually get the Wellness or the Green Ginger Limeade drinks. There food is a bit pricy, but worth it. I'm so glad they finally came to the northwest!!!!!
Love to hit this place up after a workout. Food is clean and I don't feel heavy even after a burger. Love the tofu fries and complimentary cucumber water. Food does take a while, especially take out.

I had heard of this place long prior to actually eating there as I'm a foodie and when I learned my brother was to be moving to Vegas, I immediately did a restaurant search cause I need to know places to eat when I visit, right?! Ha!

Any who... When I did in fact visit, my brother said "I have a great lunch spot I know you will like... Greens & Proteins!" - I pretended to act like I didn't know what the place was all about but let's be real, I ALREADY KNEW WHAT I WAS GOING TO ORDER! 

Sadly, when we got there, I learned they didn't have ostrich on the menu anymore (I was looking at an old menu on yelp), and their bison is no grass-finished so I mixed that option and went for my staple, salmon. As for sides, I got asparagus, sweet potatoes and added on avocado! 

Our food arrived maybe 12 minutes later, and looks amazing.... Granted I thought my Salmon portion looked a little small (but I didn't say anything). My brother and his fianc√© got bison burgers and my husband got the Cali Chicken Wrap. No one had any problems with their Food. I was initially a bit concerned for my husband because he pretty much hates everything he eats unless it's chick fil a but he did not complain at all and ACTUALLY ADMITTED to the wrap being good! He also got a peanut butter shake (that he was initially very skeptical of because when it arrived to him it looked slightly green), and sucked that baby dry!

If and when we visit my brother again, this spot will definitely be on the list of places to eat at, for a quick and lighter lunch (depending on what you order) as I am a huge fan of "build your own plate" restaurants!

Greens and Proteins.... So many great things to say about this company in general. They have a versatile menu, full of smart, clean eating food, AND they cook/prepare it all accurately. None of that over cooked broccoli or dried out chicken. The location on rainbow actually is my favorite bc the staff there is SO friendly, but this location has pretty quick service most the time. And I think their infused water is so awesome. Like icing on the cake, lol.

I just love this place! It's within walking distance of my office, which makes it super convenient, so naturally, I am here quite a bit. Without fail, Daniel always welcomes me with the happiest most genuine attitude. Today, Maria took my order and it was not the standard order, in fact I just needed salad dressing because I packed a salad for lunch today and forgot the dressing. (Stupid Monday's!)
Anyway, I told Maria to just charge me whatever I needed to be charged and I guess because I'm such a regular here they were just going to give me the dressing for free. Of course, I do not like to take anything for free so I purchased a fabulous ginger green limeade:)))) mmmmm!!!! 
So then... As I was leaving, I started typing this review and oblivious me, I left my wallet on one of the tables! The staff (John and Daniel) knew the company I worked for and they went completely out of their way to call me!!! 
Just amazing people all around and I can't say enough good things about them!!

Alright my first review from my phone! First off thanks yelp, makes it so much easier. Anyways back to the review. One of my favorite things about the Henderson area is the amount of amazing different dining options. I literally could grub off Eastern for a month straight and not get bored. Greens and Proteins is a unique healthier fresh option of just about anything you normally eat. They offer fresh juices and smoothies with everything from kale, to watermelon, pineapple and wheat grass. They also have elk and ostrich burgers and bison cheesesteaks. My personal favorites are the wellness drink (a veggie/fruit mixture) and the berry parfait. That comes with yogurt, house made granola, dried and fresh fruit. There are breakfast lunch and dinner options available, and they come with sides like jicama or tofu fries. This place has made eating healthy so much easier. The staff is polite and educated in the foods they offer. There is also a "spa water" which is a cucumber lemon infused water. YUM. Honestly, I plan on being the duchess to this place very soon. 
Extra: check in on yelp for a $1 off :)

Menu descriptions are poorly written and inaccurate.  Case in point Jicama Fries are just strips of raw jicama.  We ordered extra as it sounded like something new and worth a try.  Cold jicama strips did not come close to meeting expectations.

Okay so I came back to Greens and Proteins. Not much has changed which is a good thing. The staff were again friendly and informative. They do really try to have the answers to their food. I kind of stumped them today but it doesn't take away at all from how I feel about this establishment. The only thing they didn't know was whether or not there soy products are organic. I think as a health restaurant that should be something that should be known. But other than that people were great. The food came out hot for the hot food and cold for the cold food. It was cooked to the right temperature. The food does taste fresh. The food is always good. The restaurant is clean. Even the bathroom is clean. I kind of use the bathroom as a way to make sure the entire place is clean. If they keep their bathroom clean they for damn sure will keep their restaurant clean. The only reason I don't give them a five star is because they aren't the best food I have ever had. But damn it they are good! I would recommend this place to everyone. Specifically the one on Grand Canyon and Flamingo. That's the only one I've been to. Keep up the good work Greens and Proteins! You always satisfy me!

Ostrich burger was amazing! I highly recommend it, notwithstanding its price. The sweet potato fries are well worth the upgrade! I particularly like how they wrap the pickle in baggie so it doesn't get the burger's bun or any of the fries soggy. Look forward to coming back!
Paid $20 for a GMO soy breakfast wrap (only vegan option for breakfast) and a non-organic cup of juice. Pretty disappointing for a place call GREENS & Proteins. I will not be back.

Everything we ordered was good. 

Friendly staff, good location, easy parking. 

I ordered the burger, I'm not 100% it's grass fed beef but it was good. 

Daughter had hummus with pita bread, good as well. 

Husband ordered salmon, he said it was ok, and a green healthy smoothie, as good as a green smoothie can be. 


Been here a few times and always satisfied with what we ordered and the service. 

Thank you greens and proteins.

Wellness drink was delicious. I also had the greek breakfast and the green shake, both were great!
The manager needs to work on his customer service, but all of the other employees were nice.
Overall good place, something for everyone, vegas, vegitarian, or not.
I am glad this place opened less than a mile from me. I am so happy. More healthy alternatives.

Tried this place after a Pilates class down the street. I love it! I wish It was closer to where I live. I legit copied the tofu and jicama fries at home. They were soooo good and truly an awesome alternative to reg fries. Yummy cucumber water too....and its free!!!
Love coming to Greens and Proteins. They get me lol. My create your own meal is slightly complicated but they nail it every time, regardless of which location.

The Eastern location is way better. It was freezing cold in there! I hate when restaurants are too cheap to turn on the heat. I don't enjoy eating my meals bundled up in my winter coat and still be freezing. My soup came out thick as I like it, but the tofu fries were way thinner than the Eastern location and one of them was half the length. See the pic I posted. 

There was also a customer who seemed to be a regular harassing all the women who walked in. Then, the customer walked into the kitchen and just started talking to the kitchen staff. He had no hairnet on so it's possible his hair was falling off into the food, then he just grabbed his own food from the kitchen.
Easy way for the average busy body to still eat clean without having to cook at home. Awesome selections!

All my reviews are of places that I have been many many times. Since I am only reviewing my top spots in Vegas I feel obligated to do so. My friends trust that if I review a place and it get's five stars it must be great. 

I have only been here a handful of times, but this by far is my favorite health food hangout now and will be checking in many times. You will see many campers with computers because it offers free wi/fi. I might start bring my laptop. 

What I love about this place; I can build my own meal for 10 bucks. I order either chicken breast or the Filet. The chicken breast is so juicy and seasoned nicely for about 8 bucks. Filet is cooked to order and is amazingly good for 15 bucks. Now each build your own meal comes with a generous portion of a veggie and a gain. I do the broccoli and brown rice. No sauce for me. But sauce is available.

Don't let me review fool you into thinking it is just builder your own meal. They have one of the best tasting health pizzas in town (i order the gluten free crust).  Honestly if someone can show me better I am up for the challenge.  

And of course the have the traditional health juices and wraps.

The coolest thing about this place is the water jug next to the soda fountain. Fresh Lemons and Cucumbers added to filter water. It is so good! Ask for a cup at check-out it is free. 

OK friends go and try this place and let me know what you think :-)
I like the BYOM. It makes it so simple to have a clean meal. The fact that the menu is actually on the decent side of the calorie count is awesome.

The wellness drink is top notch.
Bison wrap and the burger are excellent.
It is a "got to go to" if you're looking to eat clean and are in the area. 
My kids eat here with us and they enjoy it.
 Thanks to LVAC being near by the customers have a tad of the "look at me I'm eating organic" douchey feel but it makes for good people watching.
The staff works fast and are pretty nice. The guy posted up at the counter (manager/owner) keeps things running smooth. A+.

Just went to greens and proteins because it was recommended by my neighbor. First of all the place is spotless and the staff is friendly. I was skeptical because healthy food tends to be poor in taste but this is not the case at G&P. The chocolate and peanut butter shake was excellent and I had no clue there were vegetables mixed in. Then the meal came out and wow the whole wheat French toast was scrumptious ! This place has completely changed my mind about health food tasting like cardboard that's for sure. The owner himself even came out to greet me and ask how my meal was. I give five stars for the original recipe, the cleanliness of the establishment and the fact that the owner has direct involvement in the operation. This is always indicates that someone takes pride in what they do and wants the best quality products/services for their customers. I'll be back soon.

Really nice and healthy place to have a meal, their food is done fast but, there's always a but right! Lol, their prices are a little steep, but I guess it comes with the kind of food you're ordering which is some of the most nutritious and healthy for the restaurants in this area, I highly recommend their bison burger and the bbq chicken pizza! The atmosphere is quite pleasing and inviting, just good vibes overall!

It's been awhile since I've been back so I thought I'd give it another shot before my workout. 

There was a gentleman behind the counter instead of a woman. He was nice and was able to make my order vegan. He was also kind enough to sub out a non vegan sauce for one I would like. 

I ordered a veggie burger without the bun since the bun wasn't vegan and a gluten free vegan bun was $3 more. After consuming the burger, the bun wouldn't have made a difference. It was bland and...well bland. The tofu fries on the other hand were amazing! Add the BBQ sauce and wow! 

Service was a lot better from my first visit last year. I was asked if I needed anything else after my food was delivered and I asked if silverware was in a specific area. The gentleman then offered to grab them for me instead. The staff seemed more cheerful than what I experienced last year.
However I can see why they would be Debbie downers. They have people coming in asking for sparkling water in a different language. Just say sparkling water! 

Overall, this visit was better than the first. And to the lady who was asked to leave because your dog wasn't a service dog, there's still no sign saying service dogs only.  Remember, it's a food establishment...with an open juice bar. I'm sure most people would like their juices without animal hair.

The food is good, pricey but good. What's sad is they're rude as hell. I've had 3 negative experiences here and 1-2 good ones. Called in an order for a turkey burger, they gave me an angus once that i realized once I started eating. I called to double check & they didn't bother to care. Came in today a few minutes before they closed (I honestly forgot they closed at 5pm on a Saturday) instead of attending us they straight up we're like "sorry were closed" then close your doors maybe?? Another time they closed 2 hours before the time they said so, I had to drive back. Y'all hella annoying & it's catching up to you guys. Get it tf together no food is worth it

Awesome food!! Can't believe how good the smoothies taste considering all the veggies in it.

We have had all of the following: green smoothie (recommend!), watermelon smoothie, chocolate veggiechino (realllly good), green leaf berry blast.

Breakfast burrito, Greek scramble, Multigrain Protein Pancakes with Bananas & Pecans (awesome! Can't believe how fluffy they were in consideration), Southwest Tofu & Chorizo Burrito, Real Deal Oatmeal (this was really nice too!), and lastly, but not least, the Margherita Pizza (this tasted really good, got the thin crust, tasted really fresh). 

I would just like to say that we did not have this all at one time. This was with three people on multiple trips! Everything tasted good but these are the ones that stood out and I would recommend: green smoothie, chocolate veggiechino, watermelon smoothie, the banana pancakes, real deal oatmeal, and the margherita pizza!

I love how whatever meal plan you are on, you can find something to eat. I always get my grilled chicken, sweet potatoes, and asparagus with a side of Buffalo sauce or balsamic glaze.  If you are in the mood for a green smoothie I recommend the "green limeade".

I love this place! I got the Greek scramble, a green ginger limeade and a bison cheesesteak. Devin made the limeade and you could taste the fresh limes bursting with flavor.
The Greek scramble came with pita bread and was topped with feta cheese and kalamata olives. I had never had anything like it before but wanted to try something different. What a great choice.

All the staff is super friendly and there is quick service from FOH to getting your food. Highly recommend this place.
Very disappointed after finding out that they are not organic!! I thought a place called greens and proteins would be an organic focused place! Don't be mistaken people!
Tried something off the HCG menu.  It was Good.  I look forward to trying other items.  Very clean and nice atmosphere.
First time here definitely not the last time! It's the best vege food I've had since coming to LV!

This is one of my favorite places to each lunch! It's walking distance from my office and the food is amazing! Great quality and healthy. The staff is very nice and the owners always make sure that the customers are happy. Highly recommend greens and proteins!

Love this place! I fell I love with the Summer Berry Spinach Salad with a side of tofu fries! I'm not even vegetarian. Every time I come here I feel guilty for not being in my gym clothes. I wish there was one next to every Starbucks so I could eat healthy everywhere I travel.

Had the summer berry salad with chicken and it was delicious! My only complaint is that the large salad was not that large and $16 so it is a bit pricey but everything on the menu looked so good, I can't wait to try more!

I absolutely love this place. I'm super stoked about having a healthier alternative to choose from especially when you're on the go. I come here at least once a week and my favorite drink is Green Ginger Limeade. Thank you to G&P for coming to the North side of town

One of the best and freshest food restaurants you will have. I ordered a buffalo chicken wrap w/ sweet potato fries, the wrap w/there homemade ranch was delicious and filling the sweet potato fries were very yummy the customer service is great! Thank you Marilyn and Ceasar!

I have to agree with some of the other posters about the bland food.  Decided to check this place out for the first time with a friend and unfortunately, can't see myself returning.  I ordered a rough cut roma tomato salad and the tortilla soup.  My friend ordered what looked like a mix of steamed veggies and rice (steamed broccoli, kale, mixed squash/zucchini).   The salad they brought out for me was mainly radicchio and frisee (the red/purple lettuce and the light green "fuzzy" lettuce just in case you're not sure what that is); two of the most bitter greens that I'm least fond of.  The dressing was a bitter vinaigrette with lemon, I believe.  The tomato slices appeared to have been sitting out for a while; not fresh at all.  There were some spinach leaves thrown in along with some cucumber.  I took a bite and was hit with bland bitterness.  At first, I thought there just wasn't dressing but the guy explained that there was dressing on it.  The tortilla soup came out and did not look like soup - it appeared very thick, almost like orange hummus.  I dipped in and it tasted very sweet, like pumpkin, without any type of "mexican/tortilla" flavor.  I couldn't force myself to eat it although I was starving.  I told my friend she should try the soup to see if it was just me.  She seemed very hesitant by the look of it.  She took a dip and stated, "There is no flavor....it's just...sweet?"  I didn't quite understand what I had ordered.  Her meal came out; just steamed veggies and brown rice.  I tried some and it was fine but I can't fathom paying the $13 for this when it is one of the easiest things to make at home....steamed veggies and rice.  I lost out on $12 myself.  I couldn't eat my food and soon pushed it to the side so I could just focus on hang time and not the hunger pangs in my stomach.  When I left, I came home and made an amazing organic salad, topped with LOTS of avocado.  They should hire me to improve their salad menu. :)

Well .. Even tho it's a wee bit pricy .. I was happy... We ordered a margherita pizza and a bison burger .. I'd order the pizza again for sure.. topped it off with a delicious watermelon/ strawberry  cocktail which was really refreshing yet $6 for a drink is a bit much ... maybe if  it's organic... but I'm not sure if it is...   we will be back !!! It's nice to have a healthy option !!!

I give them a four out of five for customer service. Every time I've eaten there they've been more than accommodating. This time in particular a friend was visiting from out of town and drove from across town because he's vegan and wanted some decent food. This location was open a little later so we drove here. Even though it was about 9:15 and the close the dining room at 9:30, they let us stay and eat. Which was very nice. I try not to push anyone's buttons in the food industry, I know they want to go home after work too. So we tried to hurry. Thank you so much for allows us to have dinner! You guys are awesome!

After a workout, I wanted something clean and easy to I decided to come here! I've never tried it before but it's so close to my box that I figured "now is the perfect time!" 

Upon walking in, the employees are super nice and the restaurant is extremely clean and simple. The menu is placed on the wall and there's also paper menus as well. I wanted to try their jicama fries and their tofu fries and a bunch of my friends recommended that I try the drinks as well!

Their jicama fries have a nice crunch to them and not too much spice or seasoning so I added lime juice to it but next time, I think I'll add chili to it to give it a little kick. The tofu fries were delicious!! Nice and crispy on the outside and soft on the inside- definitely not starchy like potatoes but they were good. The seasoning on the outside of the fries was delicious! It wasn't too salty or too spicy or anything but just right. The strawberry watermelon drink I had had a scoop of protein in it and it made it into a creamy shake- perfect as a dessert and a way to get fruits and protein into my body after the workout. Stephan had the margarita pizza and it was delicious too. The crust was nice and crispy and the sauce and cheese to pizza ratio was on point. 

Price wasn't too bad, the 6 pieces of tofu fries are $2.00 and the plateful of jicama fries are $4.00. Not bad considering I don't have to chop and peel to eat jicama. My smoothie drink was I think $5.99 but I added whey protein so it was an extra dollar. Not too bad for clean eating food.

All in all, we will definitely be coming back here more often!!

Vegan, gf & raw! So excited! 
THOSE WITH CELIAC'S/GLUTEN INTOLERANCE BE CAREFUL: see below

I was very excited to discover this chain had opened up on the southwest part of town. They are ingeniously located near LVAC, making it easy to get a healthy recovery meal after your workout. We ordered: Pumpkin spice chai latte, veggie garden burger, and bison burger. Total after tip= $38.10 (we took our food to go). A little on the high end $$$. Our food came out pretty quickly, but our smoothie took longer than expected. I was hoping to get that first and sip on that as an appetizer while we waited for our food. I don't know if they forgot about our smoothie or was just slow on making it. I did notice however, people after me get their drink before me, they also knew him on a first name basis and gave him the extra out of the blender in a separate cup. They should treat everyone as if they are a regular. Talk about not making me feel special. 

~Pumpkin Chai Tea Latte; Chai Tea, Pumpkin, Green Cabbage, Carrots, Butternut Squash, Flax Seeds, Ginger, Cinnamon, Nutmeg, Walnuts, Agave Nectar. This was really good and very filling. Although the cabbage was pronounced, the smoothie was well balanced and tasted raw (the way I like it).

~Bison burger w/ jicama fries; choice of swiss or cheddar cheese, lettuce tomato and onion on a whole grain bun. He wished he got it with cheddar rather than swiss. "Jicama fries" are just sliced jicama lightly seasoned with what looks/tastes paprika. 

*Veggie garden burger; I was extremely excited because I'm a sucker for alfalfa sprouts. I asked the cashier if the veggie patty was gluten free, as I have had a difficult time finding a veggie patty that does not use "wheat gluten" as a binder. He asked someone on the cooking line, who I assume was a manager, and he said "yes, it's gf, the patty is soy based protein" I took their word for it and gambled the risk. Sure enough I think the veggie patty is glutenous so BEWARE to those with celiac's/gluten intolerance. I got sick, as I do from eating or cross-contaminating with gluten/wheat. I have yet to bring my concern to the attention of the staff. Moving forward, the burger was eh-okay. My gluten free bun was hard (it's difficult to get a soft, buoyant bun using gluten free flour, especially if you're taking your item to go. In the future I will dine in. I ordered my burger with tofu fries. I was told that they dust the tofu blocks with rice flour and fry it in corn oil, so the oil should not be a point of cross contamination, as there isn't anything else with regular flour going into the oil. My burger came with the sprouts, bibb lettuce, tomato, and red onion. I also added vegan cheese, it's shredded.

We also added avocado to our sandwiches ($0.75/burger) for a quarter of an avocado (rip off). I don't mind paying extra for modifications, but make it worth my while and not be so skimpy! At least give me a half an avocado for that price, so that I can have it in every bite as opposed to just half my burger. I was charged extra for vegan cheese, again this would be fine, but there was less than a teaspoon sprinkled on my burger, with a $1.00 up-charge.

Although the food is pricey, it's raw, healthy, and typically quick, right up my alley. I will be back because there is not many others around like this and to inform them of my gf veggie patty concerns. There are just a few "tweeks" they need to adjust before they get the 5th star from me.I hope they properly label their menu on their website and physical menu so gluten free & vegan items are clearly marked. Just remember they do not operate out of a certified gluten free kitchen, but it seems that for the most part they handle issues like cross contamination okay.

Service was exceptional. There was a constant line (with one cashier) at 3:00pm. He was very nice and patient with me since I had a lot of questions.

Horrible service. The staff seemed like it was their first day. I waited 20 minutes for a turkey burger. Then they didn't make my juice, I asked 3 staff members for my drink all said yes and never returned. I had to finally ask for a refund. This place is amateur at best, I didn't expect 5 star service but I expected prompt service and good food! Never again!

Sitting here fully relishing in my vegan/gluten free crusted leftover, magical tasting, mouth watering, insane vegetarian pizza, for BREAKFAST! What the fck on this being seriously my favorite... Here's the greatness of out-of-the box divine eating, dip the pizza in the Russian sauce that comes with the tofu-yummy-"fries," order the sauce on the side and quadruple dip away... Plus the exquisitely stunning goddess Mariah took my order and is always so elegant in customer service.
FOOD PORN in its finest!

Drive by this place all the time.. decided to check it out today!

I ordered take out for lunch for my husband and I. I asked the girl at the register what she recommended and/or the most popular dish, she didn't have much to say except asking me what I was hungry for..  I wanted to know what there top seller was, no answer. At that point another woman interjected and took over my order. 

For my husband, I ordered the Turkey Club as a wrap. For myself, I ordered the Grilled Vegetable wrap. I mentioned I eat a lot of grilled vegetable sandwiches, which she replied but you haven't had ours .... I did have it today, and will not be ordering it again. The wrap was soggy.. not much flavor to the vegetables that were not crunchy but overcooked. The beans were tasty along with the cilantro pesto, however there was only a dab or two put on it. 

For the sides, with a choice between tofu fries or jicama, I went with something different, tofu fries... different indeed.. I love tofu, but these were shaped like fish sticks and had the seasoning and taste of fish sticks you had as a child (not pleasant)
Next time, I'll go for the jicama. The woman that took my order, did say the sauce that you dip them in is good, and yes it was... I ended up putting it on my bland grilled veg. wrap. 

I also ordered the Thai Ginger soup, which I was told was made from scratch. 
It was flavorful, but could have used some salt to bring out the flavor more.. A little thick for a hot afternoon. 

I tasted my husbands Turkey Club and it was tasty. Maybe I'll order that the next time. 

The service was nice and friendly.. I will go back and give it another try... 
For a first time experience,  today's meal proved to me that if it good for you, then it doesn't taste good.

The location is a bit isolated from the center/strip but overall great to get away from the norm and people. The teriyaki chicken pizza is good but the chicken tasted a bit old; the breakfast yogurt needs more gogurt if felt like cereal with no milk. the girls at the counter were amazing. Bathrooms smell good and the location detailed cleaned.

I ordered through postmate two angus burgers, I live right down the street from the place, but I am 9 months pregnant with no car.
The food came cold, all mushy, really disappointed

The food is delicious, the staff are friendly and the service is quick. The green shake and Wellness drink are my favorite. Sometimes I'll customize my orders to change things up and G & P satisfies all my needs. It's nice to find a place that serves quality food.

Eat well and feel swell.

That is how I feel after every meal here! It is a really cute restaurant that is always packed and after you taste the food you understand why. The staff are professional and friendly. I have yet to find something that is not overly exciting to the tastebuds.

My go-to beverage of choice is the green ginger limeade. It is a drink that I crave all the time!

The latest food adventure was the spaghetti squash parm, and I will be back for more! I also highly recommend the veggie wrap. Not sure what is in the sauce but the first bite made me wish all vegetarian dishes tasted that good!
Seriously Yummy Health Food. That's all you need to know. The Green Leaf Berry Blast Smoothie is my addiction and less than 250 Calories!

Love this pace so much. It's great to know that I can order a healthy meal that will satisfy my belly but best of all my tastebuds. I usually order pick up. I literally live 5 mins away. I call before i leave the house and when i get there, BOOM! my food is ready. Service is fast, and i usually find parking right away out in front. The place inside has a good amount of seating. It's nice and bright inside. Staff is always super friendly & on point. Will continue to order from this place.
The service here is always wonderful but today was excellent. Chris gave some suggestions and was very very helpful. He also explained some menu options we were unsure of to try next time.
Staff is friendly and accommodating to requests with orders but everything else is kind of blah

I would like to give this place higher rating, but I can't. Here's why: I ordered some food last night to go. It was late, I had worked all day and didn't want to have make anything. My family decided to get some food as well as some drinks too. Keep in mind this was all vegan food. The burgers I got were quite bland and I did not enjoy the jicama fries at all. The pizza I ordered was made incorrectly. The watermelon strawberry drink I ordered was just bad. Not one person in my family liked it. And one drink was just flat out missing. I called them and they said "oh it's right here" but they had locked the doors behind me to close up and would not give me my last drink, even though I could see it in the counter through the window. I ordered through yelp, who tried to get a refund for me on my behalf, but this place would only refund me for 1 drink and the pizza. I got stuck paying for 2 terrible burgers and 1 terrible drink as well. Not cool.

I do really like their smoothie options though.

Amazing service!!! 
I ordered a vegan burger, raw vegan pizza, and hummus and pita for my sister and I.
My sister is not vegan. 
She did not like the raw vegan pizza and George was so nice and professional. 
He explained to her if the food is not subpar that she can trade it out. 
He deserves a promotion! 
Thanks Greens&Proteins. 
Definitely coming back!

You know...I'm really not sure what to really rate Greens and Proteins. I like it, it's different...but then again...I'm not too big of a fan. Maybe I need to go here more than once...but with the prices..maybe not. =/

Anyways...my boyfriend and I wanted to start eating healthier. We're not health freaks but we don't want to become obese one day either. He heard about this place through his co workers. The thought of "making your own meal" intrigued him so we were willing to give it a try. We walked in knowing their prices were on the higher end side.

We both decided to get the "make your own meal" plate. To sum it up, PORTIONS ARE SMALL. It was actually perfect for me because I get full easily anyways but for all you "big eaters"...be warned. This MAY NOT fill you up. Yes, it IS a healthy restaurant afterall. Yes, the whole point in small portions is because it is healthy for you. But I'm just saying....
 It may fill me up but PERSONALLY, it still left something for me to desire.

We also got two drinks. He got that green drink (sorry forgot the name of it but I've seen a lot of Yelpers get it) and I got the berry antioxidant smoothie. They tasted different...but a good different. Man....after drinking this, it puts Jamba Juice and Tropical Smoothie to shame. Greens and Proteins smoothie drinks tasted natural and healthy. You can tell it has natural ingredients and fresh fruits and veggies...unlike all the other sugar and crap that maybe be in Jamba and Tropical.

So why 3 stars and not a higher rating? 
-2 stars for the price. It seriously pays to be healthy. =/ I think with 2 drinks and 2 meals ran our bill to $30+ ....for that price, we could have went to Cheesecake Factory lol 

Will we be back? Ehh....maybe...

Love this place! Nice outdoor seating and the food is fantastic and healthy. The juices are fresh and not bottled. Greens and proteins is a great place to hang, meet-up, do business and enjoy great healthy food! Try it! The have a great free spa water in the back!
Food was dry. Employees at register was rude... first time trying this restaurant and no one could explain anything to me . Won't be back !!

The items I've tried here were delicious! Healthy eats can be had here. 

I Will be back
This place has great vegan options for food and drinks. It's good quality, healthy, and tasty! It is pretty efficiently run as well, do they don't keep you waiting long even if it gets busy.

This place is an awesome healthy option not too far from the Vegas strip. Like 8 mins from the MGM. I got the veggie burger and loved it. Super tasty with the vegan cheese. They have everything- smoothies, salads, fish, meat, sandwiches, pizza. Not organic though... still I'll be back!


Lots of parking. 

Good service.

I tried the chocolate peanut butter banana shake for only $7.50 and the Real Deal Oatmeal for $5.99. I will definitely  be back! I stopped eating meat over a year ago. It's hard to find healthy options for vegetarians. This place is great for that. The prices aren't too high, the food selection is great, and they are open early (7am on Sunday).

After trying many other "healthy" restaurants in the area, I have come back to try greens & proteins a few times and had to update my review because it really is delicious and nutritious! I love the "build your own" option where you can pick a protein, veggie and carb. I'm now addicted!

Stopped in for the first time today. Had some really tasty oatmeal and a real bright and refreshing watermelon strawberry juice. The decor and the plating are higher end then normal fast food places and the offerings are more interesting and varied. Minus one star because I'm a cheap skate. 12 something for my stuff today. Not horrible but I would be super happy if it was 9 or 10 bucks, but it's all good.

Again, super pricey but SUPER GOOD! 

It was my first time and it's near my job so I got it to go. I ordered it a little in advance (my fault) so I didn't get to enjoy the tofu fries as much as I would have dining in. The seasoning was good on them but I definitely wouldn't recommend them for takeout unless you are eating them immediately. (Duh) 

Got the bison burger because I read multiple reviews. I got mine with cheddar, turkey bacon, and avocado. So SO good!!! The flavor of this burger was amazing. Over a week after eating it and I'm drooling on the keyboard over this review. I didn't think I would get a burger of all things here but I am so happy I did! 

I love juices so I tried the green ginger juice (don't remember the exact name) it was probably the best juice I've ever purchased. I love ginger and this juice was just too good. I will definitely be stopping back for at least the juice bar if  I don't feel like spending $20 on lunch.

If I could eat this everyday, I would. But it's a little on the pricey side so wishful thinking. I always order the Build Your Own Meal. You choose your protein, grains, vegetable and a sauce. I usually order the chicken $9.99 or the salmon $12.99 and I would get quinoa and kale. Portions are great for lunch or dinner. Pretty good portion control ratio too might I add.

I love eating here....I feel very "clean and happy" afterwards...if that makes sense. =)

Surely a great fan of greens and proteins.

Went on a diet for lent and this place helped a lot.  If I wanted to eat out and got tired of eating the diet food at home this was the place.  

California  grilled chicken wrap is my favorite.  You can build your own meals and learned if you're being carb free they had these "HCG" meals?  Very convenient.  

Very timely with you're pick up orders, friendly staff, clean restaurants.  Love that they have a water dispenser with lemons and limes in them. Really refreshing.

My favorite go to diet spot.
Yummy place. Health eating. Great burgers & wraps. Haven't tried there smoothies yet, but I plan too. I will definitely be back here alot. I love the atmosphere.

I stopped by Greens and Proteins with my kiddos after church to try a juice and salad. My kids wanted a pizza which they devoured! It looked pretty tasty but I am on a cleanse and did not indulge. I ordered the Green Juice which was more like a smoothie. I would have given another star because the juice/smoothie had an amazing taste and was filled with incredible ingredients. I just couldn't get over the textures. If they sifted out all of the pulp and just left behind a smooth chilled JUICE, I would have been in heaven. Alas, I will return again anyway and try a protein and another juice because the workers were very friendly, knowledgable and inviting.
Went to this location for the first time and I must say the customer service is excellent along with their healthy food :)
I'll update my review just because I like the food and it's very convenient to order it there.

This local chain of healthy restaurants are good enough to keep me from diving off the deep end, food-wise, into all that Las Vegas offers. This is my weekly "in-to and out-of" stop. I especially like showing up at my hotel with my Greens and Protein Wellness shake. Everyone swears they will head there after work because they are soooooo good.
Also, I cannot figure out what alcohol pairs with health drinks, so I don't spike it. This is a good thing.
HCG menu is great and the Margherita Pizza is a goal. I have had it and crave it.
This is Yummy-Healthy.

I can say I've only had one item on the menu that I wasn't a fan of (Veggie Garden Burger), other than that I have liked everything else I've tried on the menu. I like that both locations are located in the same plaza as the gym I belong to, it's convinient to grab a bite to eat afterwards. So why not 5 stars? Here's my beef with G&P:

1. The listed calories next to the item doesn't count the entire entree, i.e;
      *Turkey Burger w/ alfafla, L,T,O and low fat cheese (served on a bun and tofu fries) that is everything included in the entree, so my thought would be the calorie count should include everything, right? Nope, it doesn't include the bun or the tofu fries or the cheese. 

2. Food should be organic for the price. Especially the vegetables/fruits going into the juices & smoothies. Average price is $7.50.

3. Employees should be more knowledgable about their product. When I asked two employees about the calorie count, both gave me a different answer. Also, when I had lunch with my vegan friend, she asked if the sauce that came with the tofu fries was vegan, the girl had no idea, she had to go in the back to ask. Turns out, it's not. 

I still like the place, I am just more aware of what I'm eating here. There are a few items on the menu I'm in love with, vegan pizza, tofu fries and the wellness drink, these will keep me coming back, also I love the cucumber water.

If you're looking for something healthy but has a burst of flavor than you've come to right place!  It has a cute modern decor, all the meals have caloric value listed, and the food is fresh.  Yes, it may be a little pricer for a lunch place but I think you get what you pay for.  I had the greek pizza and it was DELICIOUS.  Cucumbers, feta, tomatoes, olives, and a little bit of sauce and boom - flavor in your mouth.  I highly recommend this place.  Looking over at my neighbors dishes, it makes me interested to try more!  There's so much to choose from.
Greens and protein by far my favorite lunch spot very reasonable for high-quality food my suggestion is the bison burger with tofu fries pizzas good great little snacks like brownies good stuff
Very good but not mindblowing; just wish it wasn't so expensive and then it would be just right.

Originally I had wrote a good review for this place but my last visit really had me angry I came on a Sunday on a day they close "early" 3pm 

I walked in maybe 30/40 min before they close I was greeted by a female worker who was having a convo with someone that was eating there.... she LOOKED at me and said hello 

I go to the front and wait no one comes to take my order mean while this female employee is just in her convo... I literally stand there for 15 min I timed it!!! Finally I asked is someone going to help me she then turns to me oh it's Sunday we shut down the kitchen 30 min early.... I tell her I've been standing here 15 min you could've told me or said something ANYTHING she then says well I can ask for u see if they will make you something ...... I just said no thanks and just walked out maybe if you weren't to busy socializing on your job sitting on your butt you could do your job or least let your customers know instead of leaving them standing around 










oooo happy they finally opened I've been to all there other locations but this one is the closet for me at the moment

Everything is the same as the rest the cashiers are just as nice and helpful :) 

I'll basically be living here now 

I couldn't be happier

Let's say...it smells healthy and clean in the cafe. I know that might sound weird but when you go to this place to eat you will know what I mean. 

I elected to try a protein shake here today and skip the Las Vegas Athletic club whey drink I normally get. The line was long and the dining area was packed. The staff was quick and friendly. I ordered a peanut butter banana smoothie which was chalk full of veggies,peanuts,raisins etc. I elected almond milk as well. The price was reasonable and I received my smoothie really quick. 

As for the taste... Less to be desires but good for being healthy. I would order a different shake next time. The texture was too gritty for me. I prefer my smoothies.. Well smooth! 

The food looked amazing and smelled great. Everyone eating seemed to love the food. I was impressed with the menu and hope to go back soon and try a bison burger! Yum!!!

I was extremely excited to try Greens & Proteins. Their veggie burger and tofu fries were praised by many so I figured it would be as amazing as reviewed.

I was mos def disappointed. The patty was really soggy. The texture was just weird and unlike any GOOD veggie burger I've had before. The tofu fries were OKAY. They were really crunchy on the outside but inside, it tasted like a soft scramble of egg whites. I don't think mine were cooked enough. & there were only 6 fries. SIX. Maybe if I had 10, I would've ate enough to have the same result as most reviewers.  

The experience didn't kill my hope in Greens & Proteins. I just won't ever have a burger there again. But I definitely will give their shakes a chance. They looked amazing!!
Loved their other locations, now I have one easy to get to from my house. Bison cheese steak in a cabbage wrap is to die for

I was really surprised of how good Greens and Proteins is. I had never been there,  but after my first visit I'll be going there often.  Service was fantastic as was the food.  I had an Ahi Protein Salad and it was absolutely great.

Why has it taken me so long to write a review for Greens & Proteins? I love this place for all the healthy items they serve, so I was surprised on my last visit that I never wrote one. 

Let me start by saying that they offer $1 off juices and smoothies with Yelp check in! My go-to drink would be their Wellness Drink. It contains green grapes, green apples, pineapples, oranges, lime, wheat grass, kale, spinach, collard greens, ginger, flax seed and agave. Sounds like a salad gone wrong, but it's delicious. Its sweet, so you don't get the overpowering vegetable taste. Just remember to keep stirring it so you don't get a thick sludge at the end. It's an awesome meal replacement or a post workout drink. 

Their food is just as healthy as their drinks. Nothing is processed and everything is made to order. I like their tofu fries (light on the seasoning) and their margherita pizza as well. They have burgers and wraps, with the options of whole wheat buns or spinach tortillas as substitutions. They also offer unique items like bison or ostrich patties for your burgers. The prices are a little higher here, but you have to remember that eating healthy doesn't come cheap. You do get high quality ingredients and friendly helpful service. So I think it's so worth the price.
Extremely nommynommy I have never been a fan of tofu and today trying a Greek scramble the tofu in it was amazing

G&P is my go to healthy fast food restaurant. I get the same thing every time I go there: salmon, sweet potato mash, broccoli, and lemon butter AND pesto sauces. How can you go wrong with that? It's delicious and healthy and got that Mediterranean diet on lock! The water has chlorophyll in it and the vibes are great. I've been to both locations and it's always dependable for healthy and bomb food. I hope more restaurants like this stem from their initiative!

This place is fantastic! Great variety on the menu with a little something for everyone. I personally got the turkey club with the sweet potato fries. The food came out very quick and they were the best sweet potato fries I have ever had! The turkey club was also terrific! I am definitely coming back soon!

LOVE this place! I make a 15-20 minute drive every other day just to come here. Their veggie burger is delicious, especially with avocado! I always order it with the wellness juice on the side. Employees are also very friendly here! I would definitely recommend.

Ok, I will be the first to admit that eating anywhere that is remotely healthy is a major turn off for me. I even had one of my Yelp friends comment on my check in thinking it was a joke. Of course I wanted to appease my wife because she wanted seared ahi which is something that I like so at least that was a positive. 

Located just right off the south side of the 215 and Decatur exit in the same plaza as TSP Baking Company.

When we arrived I was pleasantly surprised at some of the choices they had for it were things that appealed to me. Things like an angus burger, bbq chicken pizza, and heck even filet mignon.

Wifey recommended I try the bison burger for it would taste just like some of my favorite burgers from other places. Ever since she had it about 15 years ago, it has been one of her favorite types of meat. 

So I order the Bison Burger with Tofu Fries, wifey got the Seared Ahi Tostada Bites, first son got the California Grilled Chicken sandwich, and youngest son got the build your own Filet Mignon accompanied with Asparagus.

The Bison Burger ($12.99) is a half pound patty topped with your choice of lowfat cheese (I got cheddar), lettuce, tomatoes, and onion. The Tofu Fries are wonderfully crispy fried and it comes with a tangy Russian dressing to dip in.

The Mini Ahi Tostada Bites ($9.99) are mini tortilla crisps with an edamame bean puree, wheatgrass slaw, sweet chili sauce, and seared ahi tuna. Kind of has a sweet and salty taste to it. Nice combination with the crunch as you chew. 

The California Grilled Chicken Sandwich ($10.99) has turkey bacon, lettuce, onion, tomato and extra virgin mayo. It was just ok. I think it could use more spices sauce wise. 

The build your own Filet Mignon ($16.99) comes with asparagus. The steak itself was just ok. My son wanted it medium rare but got it well done. He didnt want to wait for another one so he just ate it and said it was still kind of decent. Comes with some kind of balsamic dressing to dip it in. The asparagus was cooked perfect. It was lightly pan fried in olive oil and topped with a bit of garlic salt. Still had a nice crisp it. 

Service was on point. You order at the counter and then they bring it out to you. As they bring out people's orders, they go around asking if everybody is ok while cleaning up any tables that need it. Very efficient.

Overall, I am definitely a fan. Please dont tell anybody though, it would ruin my rep. Lets just keep it to ourselves ok? I would go as much as to say that trying the Bison Burger was the closest thing to a life changing event next to getting married, having kids, etc. I guess this health thing is not so bad after all.

Yelp 2017 Review #9
642 overall

It was alright, we where all hungry and expecting filling fresh food based on the menu & pictures.  It was just ok nothing special salads where exactly what they where lettuce nothing spectacular but for $11.00 you'd expect to be full.
Clean and Healthy Food! Chef Caesar and the entire staff were friendly with professional service! Favorite restaurant in Vegas to eat accompanied by idrink water!

Good quality clean eating meals and smoothies. It can be a little pricey but it's worth it. I'm a big fan of the BBQ chicken pizza on lavash bread. If you want to make your own healthy dish, they have a build your own selection! 

Convenient location next to the LVAC. Good customer service and clean environment.

Really love their options and portion sizes. The salads are very delicious and the bison burger is LOADED with protein! The taste is very delicious and I've yet to try their drinks. Btw they have alternatives to Coke and Pepsi for fountain drinks and they're really good too. It's too bad they don't have one by my house in long beach.

Great food and great service - awesome waxing salon next door I usually get my brows done while they blend my smoothie. Greens and proteins have all options for breakfast lunch and dinner as well as snacks and smoothies - no more excuses for fast food! Prices are a bit on the high side but who can put a price on health.

I had a great experience. The menu has so many wonderful and delicious healthy options. There are several options for modifying for the picky eaters. The cater to your heart's desire. I enjoyed one of their delicious salads. I had the size small, and it was plentiful, fresh and soooo good. My salad came with crunchy cheese croutons, made in house. I didn't purchase a drink because they offer a refreshing cucumber and lemon water to all customers. I'm glad I tried, it was so refreshing. I never felt so good walking out with a full stomach but not tired. Can't say enough. Must try.

My favorite place to grab a quick bite. I have been on a really strict exercise and diet plan for the past month & I am so grateful for this place. I can be confident that anything I order will not only taste good but also will fit in with my diet. staff is always so sweet & the manager Savannah is wonderful. Great for pre or post workout!

I really wanna like this place. I would give it 3.5 stars if I could. The food is good if you know what to order. If you do not, you might get stuck with something less than good.

The good-
The juices are pretty good. Never been disappointed here.
They have a sort of build your own meal. You pick a protein, grain, veggie and a sauce. That was probably my favorite meal here.
I also have tried the Gluten free pizza and it was pretty tasty.

The bad-
I ordered a burger with a gluten free bun. The gluten free bun was stale and hard.  I was really disappointed.
I know people seem to love the tofu fried but I did not like them. They were just rubbery and tasteless.


The service for me has always been pretty good. Once, they messed up me and my husband's order and they were quick to make it right, giving us an extra order of tofu fries. Though once my husband went in to pick up our order and a kid at the front desk called him "boss" which really annoyed him. He found it a bit condescending. 

Yes, I will go here again. I actually meet people here all the time. The dinning room is comfortable the decor is organic and inviting.

I absolutely love eating at this place but their wait time can be super long. Waited 15 minutes just to get a smoothie! They should have someone specifically at the juice/smoothie section. If they already do, they need a more efficient one. Not to mention parking is super tight and one shouldn't have to pay for parking for more than 15 mins worth for a quick juice/smoothie!!

tldr

They finally opened up a location up north, right next to LVAC.
The price point is pretty fair for what they offer.

Got:
-bison cheesesteak; paired with tofu fries and a pickle, right amount of flavor and cheese, delicious!
-bison burger; surprisingly tender and paired well with turkey bacon.

My boyfriend and I came here on a sunny Tuesday morning really excited that there is a healthy place with vegan options in the north side of town finally! We ordered the Southwest Tofu and Soy Chorizo Burrito and the Green Ginger Limeade Juice just to try it out for the first time and it was really great, I especially loved the crispy tofu that they served alongside the burrito. The juice was so satisfyingly tasty! It had all of my favorite flavors in one. 
They have complementary cucumber lime water in a nice fountain dispenser by the rest of the fountain drinks and it was delicious and a nice added touch. Definitely will be frequenting this location.

I've eaten here several times. It's consistently great. The service has always been really good too. I love that calories are listed next to the options. The tofu fries are the best! I think their portion size is a little small but over all a nice healthy option.

besides it being healthy the food is just amazing.. who knew pizza could be so yummy and healthy. 
I had the new white turkey bean bowl, by far my favorite

LOVE this place. Lots of choices from breakfast items, to juices and smoothies, to pizza, salads, burgers and wraps. They've got a variety of Goooood food that's gooood for you. 

I'm a big fan of Bison and this place has A bison burger AND a bison cheese steak wrap.  the bison wrap has so much flavor and I love the seasoned tofu fries or the jicama fries on the side. My cousin got a steak burger that she said was also just as delicious. 

So far I've been there and eaten three times. I went there once after taking an exam because I needed some fuel and ended up staying there to grade some papers while eating and sipping on some cucumber water (they do have wifi or you can use the Starbucks wifi next door!) and another couple times with friends and family. Choose something different each time! :) 

As far as service, I've had some friendly people and a couple not so friendly people at the register, but it hasn't affected me too much, so don't let that stop you. :)

in a world of unhealthy choices greens and proteins provides you with nothing but the highway quality food made to treat your taste buds right but also your health.. This place is a life saver for anyone trying to eat healthy on the go

This place deserves no stars. Greens and Proteins is an awesome resturant, but this location is the worse. Having visited a couple times and having terrible experiences everytime; not only with my food being burnt but with the lack of service. This review is one I needed to write, for the management to fix this problem. Most recently, I ordered a medium rare bison burger and sweet potato fries and an extra side of fries. I got a well done burger and literally burnt fries, as you will see in the photos. I understand a mistake but when I addressed it both employees acted dumb about it. As if they always make burnt fries, which made me not want to be as polite, but I let it go very disappointed and not even with an courtesy sorry. The pizza my friend got was terrible quality too. I can say with confidence that this is not how Greens and Proteins always is because other locations are better. Until this is fixed I would sway anyone from stopping at this location. There was no postitives this visit only negatives.

Delicious and healthful dishes. It's a bit precious in terms of clientele, though. People who seem enamored of their own reflection, or who don't cast one. But still, you can't find prepared food with such tasteful variety and without additives, preservatives, and other junk.

Called in food 30 min in advance. Asked to have ready at 1. Arrived 10 minutes after 1. Was not ready, took an additional 30 minutes. Brought out 1 of the 4 things that were ordered, completely wrong. Had to tell them again what we even ordered. Ahi Tuna salad was ok, had asked for dressing on the side but they put it in both salads so before they walked away, had to remind them the specifics of the 3 Rd salad.  No one was apologetic, as a matter of fact, they seemed annoyed that we questioned why the food was not done.
Healthy and tasty! Gotta try the soy fries!

This place is just eh. Not very impressed. I understand this is a healthier place but their food is lacking some serious flavor. 
I would come here if I was dieting but would much rather go somewhere else and modify my meal by asking for veggies on the side, no sauce, etc. than to come here and have a "healthy" one.
Plenty of other healthy places with better flavor.
good food outside the tofu fries. im seeing more competition from other health food restaurants. its good to see the healthy trend gaining momentum. their turkey burger is always my go to lunch item.

If I'm completely depleted after a workout and the thought of making a green smoothie or cooking breakfast makes me even more tired, you'll find me here picking up a Green Shake with Almond Milk. You can also see them cutting up fresh fruit and veggies in between orders. I have yet to venture out into their other drinks, but I did recently try their Breakfast Burrito that definitely fueled me post-workout. I know a lot of people say this place is over-priced, but healthy ingredients are generally pricier and what you are really paying for is the convenience and knowing/seeing your food is freshly prepared. And......they have packets of Cholula for to-go!
Delicious healthy food that's dash diet friendly. Great service too! I have an egg allergy that makes eating out difficult but not here. I wish they had a restaurant near us in Seattle!
Excellent food with prompt, very friendly service. Priced extremely well with huge portions. Smoothies are delicious. Highly recommended.

I had been wanting to try this place for a while and finally got the chance. I built my own plate with chicken, brown rice, broccoli and teriyaki sauce. I kind of hoped they would mix everything up for me but they didn't. It's cool though, I realize a lot of people may want to make that decision for themselves. The food is delicious and doesn't seem overly salty like so many restaurants. The nutrition and macronutrient info is on the menu by each item which makes it super helpful for those of us who keep track of that stuff! The only odd thing that I noticed was they didn't have any natural sweeteners (like honey or stevia), only white sugar and artificial stuff. A place that prides itself on health should probably start offering better options! But, it didn't affect me that day or anything so not holding it against them. The servers were friendly and the menu is quite extensive. I'd love to come back and try the smoothies and some of their other items!

I love it here. Can I move in? ... will wash dishes for veggie burgers! I'm not even a vegetarian. Not even close. My eating habits range from ravenous 4 year old that skipped lunch, to bougie Michelin Star brat. 

Anyway, I ordered via Uber Eats. The food came really fast and was still hot. I opted for my favorite veggie burger on the planet, the G&P Veggie Burger. It's a lentil black bean, brown rice, mushroom, celery, carrot, onion, cilantro, basil, garlic and cashew patty that's 10.99. It makes me forget about bacon. Although I'm not a fan of lentils, it's not "lentily"--we'll pretend that's a word. I ordered it with their tofu fries. The bun was flaky, fresh & soft, the burger was very flavorful & moist (ew I hate the word moist lol) and the fries were different but cool! 

I love that they offer so many options for specialty diets. It makes it easier to order out for my kiddo. He got the Angus Burger on their gluten free bun with dairy free cheese. He loved it. It's hard enough dealing with severe allergies, places like G&P allows us not worry about allergen contaminations. 


Overall great food, I'll be back!

It's so nice to have a healthy, quick option to grab a bite to eat. The menu is full of delicious options with low fat content and fresh ingredients. Yes, the menu is a little on the pricy side, but you get what you pay for. Juices are made with real fruits and vegetables and healthy ingredients are not cheap for anyone!
The inside is bright with vibrant green walls and large windows. The kitchen is open so you can watch the employees make your juices. The staff is always friendly and they bring your food out to you when it is ready. I appreciate this opposed to your number being called out. It feels more personal. 

*Gluten free options
*Breakfast, Lunch, Dinner
*Fresh juices
*Seafood
*Bison
*Wraps
*Pizza
*Cucumber water
My second visit in a week.  I had the bison wrap first awesome.  Chicken teriyaki wrap second not my favorite but I think because they ease up on the sauce.  Sweet Potato fries 2 thumbs up

I get food here often.  Today they decided to not put my tofu fries in the order.  I don't see how hard it is to ensure the customer get what they pay for.  I guess if I decide to return I will just have to treat them like incompetent fast food workers and checks entire order.  This sucks because I really like their food.

Why aren't you in California!!?? I was in Vegas about 3 weeks ago and tried this place out. Admittedly I am not a super healthy eater, but my friends who live in Vegas are and they swear by this place. I went for lunch and had the Bison Cheesesteak and it was amazing! And the fact that is was much better for you than a traditional cheesesteak was even more amazing. I went back a couple of days for breakfast and it was just as good. The best thing I can say about this place is that you don't realize you are eating "healthy" food. The taste, portions, and service are great. If I could, I would eat there all the time!
